118 public GameServer(string name, IPAddress listenIp, int port, int queryPort = 0, bool isPublic = false, string password = "", bool attemptUPnP = false, int maxPlayers = 10, int? ownKey = null, UInt64? steamId = null)
119 {
120 name = name.Replace(":", "");
121 name = name.Replace(";", "");
122 if (name.Length > NetConfig.ServerNameMaxLength)
123 {
124 name = name.Substring(0, NetConfig.ServerNameMaxLength);
125 }
126
127 this.serverName = name;
128
129 LastClientListUpdateID = 0;
130
131 serverSettings = new ServerSettings(this, name, port, queryPort, maxPlayers, isPublic, attemptUPnP, listenIp);
132 KarmaManager.SelectPreset(serverSettings.KarmaPreset);
133 serverSettings.SetPassword(password);
134
135 Voting = new Voting();
136
137 ownerKey = ownKey;
138
139 ownerSteamId = steamId;
140
141 entityEventManager = new ServerEntityEventManager(this);
142
143 CoroutineManager.StartCoroutine(StartServer(isPublic));
144 }
145
146 private IEnumerable<CoroutineStatus> StartServer(bool isPublic)
147 {
148 bool error = false;
149 try
150 {
151 Log("Starting the server...", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
152 if (!ownerSteamId.HasValue || ownerSteamId.Value == 0)
153 {
154 Log("Using Lidgren networking. Manual port forwarding may be required. If players cannot connect to the server, you may want to use the in-game hosting menu (which uses SteamP2P networking and does not require port forwarding).", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
155 serverPeer = new LidgrenServerPeer(ownerKey, serverSettings);
156 }
157 else
158 {
159 Log("Using SteamP2P networking.", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
160 serverPeer = new SteamP2PServerPeer(ownerSteamId.Value, serverSettings);
161 }
162
163 serverPeer.OnInitializationComplete = OnInitializationComplete;
164 serverPeer.OnMessageReceived = ReadDataMessage;
165 serverPeer.OnDisconnect = OnClientDisconnect;
166 serverPeer.OnShutdown = GameMain.Instance.CloseServer;
167 serverPeer.OnOwnerDetermined = OnOwnerDetermined;
168
169 FileSender = new FileSender(serverPeer, MsgConstants.MTU);
170 FileSender.OnEnded += FileTransferChanged;
171 FileSender.OnStarted += FileTransferChanged;
172
173 if (serverSettings.AllowModDownloads) { ModSender = new ModSender(); }
174
175 serverPeer.Start();
176
177 VoipServer = new VoipServer(serverPeer);
178 }
179 catch (Exception e)
180 {
181 Log("Error while starting the server (" + e.Message + ")", ServerLog.MessageType.Error);
182
183 System.Net.Sockets.SocketException socketException = e as System.Net.Sockets.SocketException;
184
185 error = true;
186 }
187
188 if (error)
189 {
190 if (serverPeer != null) serverPeer.Close("Error while starting the server");
191
192 Environment.Exit(-1);
193
194 yield return CoroutineStatus.Success;
195 }
196
197
198 if (serverPeer is LidgrenServerPeer)
199 {
200#if USE_STEAM
201 registeredToMaster = SteamManager.CreateServer(this, isPublic);
202#endif
203 }
204
205 GameMain.LuaCs.Initialize();
206
207 TickRate = serverSettings.TickRate;
208
209 Log("Server started", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
210
211 GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.Select();
212 GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.RandomizeSettings();
213 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(serverSettings.SelectedSubmarine))
214 {
215 SubmarineInfo sub = SubmarineInfo.SavedSubmarines.FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name == serverSettings.SelectedSubmarine);
216 if (sub != null) { GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedSub = sub; }
217 }
218 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(serverSettings.SelectedShuttle))
219 {
220 SubmarineInfo shuttle = SubmarineInfo.SavedSubmarines.FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name == serverSettings.SelectedShuttle);
221 if (shuttle != null) { GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedShuttle = shuttle; }
222 }
223
224 started = true;
225
226 GameAnalyticsManager.AddDesignEvent("GameServer:Start");
227
228 yield return CoroutineStatus.Success;
229 }
230
231 private void OnOwnerDetermined(NetworkConnection connection)
232 {
233 OwnerConnection = connection;
234
235 var ownerClient = ConnectedClients.Find(c => c.Connection == connection);
236 if (ownerClient == null)
237 {
238 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Owner client not found! Can't set permissions");
239 return;
240 }
241 ownerClient.SetPermissions(ClientPermissions.All, DebugConsole.Commands);
242 UpdateClientPermissions(ownerClient);
243 }
244
245 public void NotifyCrash()
246 {
247 var tempList = ConnectedClients.Where(c => c.Connection != OwnerConnection).ToList();
248 foreach (var c in tempList)
249 {
250 DisconnectClient(c.Connection, DisconnectReason.ServerCrashed.ToString(), DisconnectReason.ServerCrashed.ToString());
251 }
252 if (OwnerConnection != null)
253 {
254 var conn = OwnerConnection; OwnerConnection = null;
255 DisconnectClient(conn, DisconnectReason.ServerCrashed.ToString(), DisconnectReason.ServerCrashed.ToString());
256 }
257 Thread.Sleep(500);
258 }
259
260 private void OnInitializationComplete(NetworkConnection connection)
261 {
262 string clName = connection.Name;
263 Client newClient = new Client(clName, GetNewClientID());
264 newClient.InitClientSync();
265 newClient.Connection = connection;
266 newClient.Connection.Status = NetworkConnectionStatus.Connected;
267 newClient.SteamID = connection.SteamID;
268 newClient.OwnerSteamID = connection.OwnerSteamID;
269 newClient.Language = connection.Language;
270 ConnectedClients.Add(newClient);
271
272 var previousPlayer = previousPlayers.Find(p => p.MatchesClient(newClient));
273 if (previousPlayer != null)
274 {
275 newClient.Karma = previousPlayer.Karma;
276 newClient.KarmaKickCount = previousPlayer.KarmaKickCount;
277 foreach (Client c in previousPlayer.KickVoters)
278 {
279 if (!connectedClients.Contains(c)) { continue; }
280 newClient.AddKickVote(c);
281 }
282 }
283
284 LastClientListUpdateID++;
285
286 if (newClient.Connection == OwnerConnection && OwnerConnection != null)
287 {
288 newClient.GivePermission(ClientPermissions.All);
289 foreach (var command in DebugConsole.Commands)
290 {
291 newClient.PermittedConsoleCommands.Add(command);
292 }
293 SendConsoleMessage("Granted all permissions to " + newClient.Name + ".", newClient);
294 }
295
296 GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call("clientConnected", newClient);
297
298
299 SendChatMessage($"ServerMessage.JoinedServer~[client]={clName}", ChatMessageType.Server, null, changeType: PlayerConnectionChangeType.Joined);
300 serverSettings.ServerDetailsChanged = true;
301
302 if (previousPlayer != null && previousPlayer.Name != newClient.Name)
303 {
304 string prevNameSanitized = previousPlayer.Name.Replace("", "");
305 SendChatMessage($"ServerMessage.PreviousClientName~[client]={ClientLogName(newClient)}~[previousname]={prevNameSanitized}", ChatMessageType.Server, null);
306 previousPlayer.Name = newClient.Name;
307 }
308
309 var savedPermissions = serverSettings.ClientPermissions.Find(cp =>
310 cp.SteamID > 0 ?
311 cp.SteamID == newClient.SteamID :
312 newClient.EndpointMatches(cp.EndPoint));
313
314 if (savedPermissions != null)
315 {
316 newClient.SetPermissions(savedPermissions.Permissions, savedPermissions.PermittedCommands);
317 }
318 else
319 {
320 var defaultPerms = PermissionPreset.List.Find(p => p.Name == "None");
321 if (defaultPerms != null)
322 {
323 newClient.SetPermissions(defaultPerms.Permissions, defaultPerms.PermittedCommands);
324 }
325 else
326 {
327 newClient.SetPermissions(ClientPermissions.None, new List<DebugConsole.Command>());
328 }
329 }
330
331 UpdateClientPermissions(newClient);
332 //notify the client of everyone else's permissions
333 foreach (Client otherClient in connectedClients)
334 {
335 if (otherClient == newClient) { continue; }
336 CoroutineManager.StartCoroutine(SendClientPermissionsAfterClientListSynced(newClient, otherClient));
337 }
338 }
339
340 private void OnClientDisconnect(NetworkConnection connection, string disconnectMsg)
341 {
342 Client connectedClient = connectedClients.Find(c => c.Connection == connection);
343
344 DisconnectClient(connectedClient, reason: disconnectMsg);
345 }
346
347 public override void Update(float deltaTime)
348 {
349#if CLIENT
350 if (ShowNetStats) { netStats.Update(deltaTime); }
351#endif
352 if (!started) { return; }
353
354 if (OwnerConnection != null && ChildServerRelay.HasShutDown)
355 {
356 Disconnect();
357 return;
358 }
359
360 base.Update(deltaTime);
361
362 FileSender.Update(deltaTime);
363 KarmaManager.UpdateClients(ConnectedClients, deltaTime);
364
365 UpdatePing();
366
367 if (serverSettings.VoiceChatEnabled)
368 {
369 VoipServer.SendToClients(connectedClients);
370 }
371
372 if (gameStarted)
373 {
374 respawnManager?.Update(deltaTime);
375
376 entityEventManager.Update(connectedClients);
377
378 //go through the characters backwards to give rejoining clients control of the latest created character
379 for (int i = Character.CharacterList.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
380 {
381 Character character = Character.CharacterList[i];
382 if (character.IsDead || !character.ClientDisconnected) { continue; }
383
384 if (!GameMain.LuaCs.Game.disableDisconnectCharacter)
385 {
386 character.KillDisconnectedTimer += deltaTime;
387 character.SetStun(1.0f);
388 }
389
390 Client owner = connectedClients.Find(c => (c.Character == null || c.Character == character) && c.EndpointMatches(character.OwnerClientEndPoint));
391
392 if ((OwnerConnection == null || owner?.Connection != OwnerConnection) && character.KillDisconnectedTimer > serverSettings.KillDisconnectedTime)
393 {
394 character.Kill(CauseOfDeathType.Disconnected, null);
395 continue;
396 }
397
398 if (owner != null && owner.InGame && !owner.NeedsMidRoundSync &&
399 (!serverSettings.AllowSpectating || !owner.SpectateOnly))
400 {
401 SetClientCharacter(owner, character);
402 }
403 }
404
405 TraitorManager?.Update(deltaTime);
406
407 Voting.Update(deltaTime);
408
409 bool isCrewDead =
410 connectedClients.All(c => c.Character == null || c.Character.IsDead || c.Character.IsIncapacitated);
411
412 bool subAtLevelEnd = false;
413 if (Submarine.MainSub != null && !(GameMain.GameSession.GameMode is PvPMode))
414 {
415 if (Level.Loaded?.EndOutpost != null)
416 {
417 int charactersInsideOutpost = connectedClients.Count(c =>
418 c.Character != null &&
419 !c.Character.IsDead && !c.Character.IsUnconscious &&
420 c.Character.Submarine == Level.Loaded.EndOutpost);
421 int charactersOutsideOutpost = connectedClients.Count(c =>
422 c.Character != null &&
423 !c.Character.IsDead && !c.Character.IsUnconscious &&
424 c.Character.Submarine != Level.Loaded.EndOutpost);
425
426 //level finished if the sub is docked to the outpost
427 //or very close and someone from the crew made it inside the outpost
428 subAtLevelEnd =
429 Submarine.MainSub.DockedTo.Contains(Level.Loaded.EndOutpost) ||
430 (Submarine.MainSub.AtEndExit && charactersInsideOutpost > 0) ||
431 (charactersInsideOutpost > charactersOutsideOutpost);
432 }
433 else
434 {
435 subAtLevelEnd = Submarine.MainSub.AtEndExit;
436 }
437 }
438
439 float endRoundDelay = 1.0f;
440 if (TraitorManager?.ShouldEndRound ?? false)
441 {
442 endRoundDelay = 5.0f;
443 endRoundTimer += deltaTime;
444 }
445 else if (serverSettings.AutoRestart && isCrewDead)
446 {
447 endRoundDelay = 5.0f;
448 endRoundTimer += deltaTime;
449 }
450 else if (subAtLevelEnd && !(GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode is CampaignMode))
451 {
452 endRoundDelay = 5.0f;
453 endRoundTimer += deltaTime;
454 }
455 else if (isCrewDead && respawnManager == null)
456 {
457#if !DEBUG
458 if (endRoundTimer <= 0.0f)
459 {
460 SendChatMessage(TextManager.GetWithVariable("CrewDeadNoRespawns", "[time]", "60").Value, ChatMessageType.Server);
461 }
462 endRoundDelay = 60.0f;
463 endRoundTimer += deltaTime;
464#endif
465 }
466 else if (isCrewDead && (GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode is CampaignMode))
467 {
468#if !DEBUG
469 endRoundDelay = 2.0f;
470 endRoundTimer += deltaTime;
471#endif
472 }
473 else
474 {
475 endRoundTimer = 0.0f;
476 }
477
478 if (endRoundTimer >= endRoundDelay)
479 {
480 if (TraitorManager?.ShouldEndRound ?? false)
481 {
482 Log("Ending round (a traitor completed their mission)", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
483 }
484 else if (serverSettings.AutoRestart && isCrewDead)
485 {
486 Log("Ending round (entire crew dead)", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
487 }
488 else if (subAtLevelEnd)
489 {
490 Log("Ending round (submarine reached the end of the level)", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
491 }
492 else if (respawnManager == null)
493 {
494 Log("Ending round (no living players left and respawning is not enabled during this round)", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
495 }
496 else
497 {
498 Log("Ending round (no living players left)", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
499 }
500 EndGame(wasSaved: false);
501 return;
502 }
503 }
504 else if (initiatedStartGame)
505 {
506 //tried to start up the game and StartGame coroutine is not running anymore
507 // -> something wen't wrong during startup, re-enable start button and reset AutoRestartTimer
508 if (startGameCoroutine != null && !CoroutineManager.IsCoroutineRunning(startGameCoroutine))
509 {
510 if (serverSettings.AutoRestart) serverSettings.AutoRestartTimer = Math.Max(serverSettings.AutoRestartInterval, 5.0f);
511 //GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.StartButtonEnabled = true;
512
513 GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.LastUpdateID++;
514
515 startGameCoroutine = null;
516 initiatedStartGame = false;
517 }
518 }
519 else if (Screen.Selected == GameMain.NetLobbyScreen && !gameStarted && !initiatedStartGame &&
520 (GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedMode != GameModePreset.MultiPlayerCampaign || GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode is MultiPlayerCampaign))
521 {
522 if (serverSettings.AutoRestart)
523 {
524 //autorestart if there are any non-spectators on the server (ignoring the server owner)
525 bool shouldAutoRestart = connectedClients.Any(c =>
526 c.Connection != OwnerConnection &&
527 (!c.SpectateOnly || !serverSettings.AllowSpectating));
528
529 if (shouldAutoRestart != autoRestartTimerRunning)
530 {
531 autoRestartTimerRunning = shouldAutoRestart;
532 GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.LastUpdateID++;
533 }
534
535 if (autoRestartTimerRunning)
536 {
537 serverSettings.AutoRestartTimer -= deltaTime;
538 }
539 }
540
541 if (serverSettings.AutoRestart && autoRestartTimerRunning && serverSettings.AutoRestartTimer < 0.0f)
542 {
543 StartGame();
544 }
545 else if (serverSettings.StartWhenClientsReady)
546 {
547 int clientsReady = connectedClients.Count(c => c.GetVote<bool>(VoteType.StartRound));
548 if (clientsReady / (float)connectedClients.Count >= serverSettings.StartWhenClientsReadyRatio)
549 {
550 StartGame();
551 }
552 }
553 }
554
555 for (int i = disconnectedClients.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
556 {
557 disconnectedClients[i].DeleteDisconnectedTimer -= deltaTime;
558 if (disconnectedClients[i].DeleteDisconnectedTimer > 0.0f) continue;
559
560 if (gameStarted && disconnectedClients[i].Character != null)
561 {
562 disconnectedClients[i].Character.Kill(CauseOfDeathType.Disconnected, null);
563 disconnectedClients[i].Character = null;
564 }
565
566 disconnectedClients.RemoveAt(i);
567 }
568
569 foreach (Client c in connectedClients)
570 {
571 //slowly reset spam timers
572 c.ChatSpamTimer = Math.Max(0.0f, c.ChatSpamTimer - deltaTime);
573 c.ChatSpamSpeed = Math.Max(0.0f, c.ChatSpamSpeed - deltaTime);
574
575 //constantly increase AFK timer if the client is controlling a character (gets reset to zero every time an input is received)
576 if (gameStarted && c.Character != null && !c.Character.IsDead && !c.Character.IsIncapacitated)
577 {
578 if (c.Connection != OwnerConnection && c.Permissions != ClientPermissions.All) { c.KickAFKTimer += deltaTime; }
579 }
580 }
581
582 if (connectedClients.Any(c => c.KickAFKTimer >= serverSettings.KickAFKTime))
583 {
584 IEnumerable<Client> kickAFK = connectedClients.FindAll(c =>
585 c.KickAFKTimer >= serverSettings.KickAFKTime &&
586 (OwnerConnection == null || c.Connection != OwnerConnection));
587 foreach (Client c in kickAFK)
588 {
589 KickClient(c, "DisconnectMessage.AFK");
590 }
591 }
592
593 serverPeer.Update(deltaTime);
594
595 //don't run the rest of the method if something in serverPeer.Update causes the server to shutdown
596 if (!started) { return; }
597
598 // if update interval has passed
599 if (updateTimer < DateTime.Now)
600 {
601 if (ConnectedClients.Count > 0)
602 {
603 foreach (Client c in ConnectedClients)
604 {
605 try
606 {
607 ClientWrite(c);
608 }
609 catch (Exception e)
610 {
611 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Failed to write a network message for the client \"" + c.Name + "\"!", e);
612
613 string errorMsg = "Failed to write a network message for a client! (MidRoundSyncing: " + c.NeedsMidRoundSync + ")\n"
614 + e.Message + "\n" + e.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace();
615 if (e.InnerException != null)
616 {
617 errorMsg += "\nInner exception: " + e.InnerException.Message + "\n" + e.InnerException.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace();
618 }
619
620 GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce(
621 "GameServer.Update:ClientWriteFailed" + e.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace(),
622 GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error,
623 errorMsg);
624 }
625 }
626
627 foreach (Character character in Character.CharacterList)
628 {
629 if (character.healthUpdateTimer <= 0.0f)
630 {
631 if (!character.HealthUpdatePending)
632 {
633 character.healthUpdateTimer = character.HealthUpdateInterval;
634 }
635 character.HealthUpdatePending = true;
636 }
637 else
638 {
639 character.healthUpdateTimer -= (float)UpdateInterval.TotalSeconds;
640 }
641 character.HealthUpdateInterval += (float)UpdateInterval.TotalSeconds;
642 }
643 }
644
645 updateTimer = DateTime.Now + updateInterval;
646 }
647
648 if (registeredToMaster && (DateTime.Now > refreshMasterTimer || serverSettings.ServerDetailsChanged))
649 {
650 if (GameSettings.CurrentConfig.UseSteamMatchmaking)
651 {
652 bool refreshSuccessful = SteamManager.RefreshServerDetails(this);
653 if (GameSettings.CurrentConfig.VerboseLogging)
654 {
655 Log(refreshSuccessful ?
656 "Refreshed server info on the server list." :
657 "Refreshing server info on the server list failed.", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
658 }
659 }
660 refreshMasterTimer = DateTime.Now + refreshMasterInterval;
661 serverSettings.ServerDetailsChanged = false;
662 }
663 }
664
665
666 private double lastPingTime;
667 private byte[] lastPingData;
668 private void UpdatePing()
669 {
670 if (Timing.TotalTime > lastPingTime + 1.0)
671 {
672 lastPingData ??= new byte[64];
673 for (int i = 0; i < lastPingData.Length; i++)
674 {
675 lastPingData[i] = (byte)Rand.Range(33, 126);
676 }
677 lastPingTime = Timing.TotalTime;
678
679 ConnectedClients.ForEach(c =>
680 {
681 IWriteMessage pingReq = new WriteOnlyMessage();
682 pingReq.Write((byte)ServerPacketHeader.PING_REQUEST);
683 pingReq.Write((byte)lastPingData.Length);
684 pingReq.Write(lastPingData, 0, lastPingData.Length);
685 serverPeer.Send(pingReq, c.Connection, DeliveryMethod.Unreliable);
686
687 IWriteMessage pingInf = new WriteOnlyMessage();
688 pingInf.Write((byte)ServerPacketHeader.CLIENT_PINGS);
689 pingInf.Write((byte)ConnectedClients.Count);
690 ConnectedClients.ForEach(c2 =>
691 {
692 pingInf.Write(c2.ID);
693 pingInf.Write(c2.Ping);
694 });
695 serverPeer.Send(pingInf, c.Connection, DeliveryMethod.Unreliable);
696 });
697 }
698 }
699
700 private void ReadDataMessage(NetworkConnection sender, IReadMessage inc)
701 {
702 var connectedClient = connectedClients.Find(c => c.Connection == sender);
703
704 ClientPacketHeader header = (ClientPacketHeader)inc.ReadByte();
705
706 GameMain.LuaCs.Networking.NetMessageReceived(inc, header, connectedClient);
707
708 switch (header)
709 {
710 case ClientPacketHeader.PING_RESPONSE:
711 byte responseLen = inc.ReadByte();
712 if (responseLen != lastPingData.Length) { return; }
713 for (int i = 0; i < responseLen; i++)
714 {
715 byte b = inc.ReadByte();
716 if (b != lastPingData[i]) { return; }
717 }
718 connectedClient.Ping = (UInt16)((Timing.TotalTime - lastPingTime) * 1000);
719 break;
720 case ClientPacketHeader.RESPONSE_STARTGAME:
721 if (connectedClient != null)
722 {
723 connectedClient.ReadyToStart = inc.ReadBoolean();
724 UpdateCharacterInfo(inc, connectedClient);
725
726 //game already started -> send start message immediately
727 if (gameStarted)
728 {
729 SendStartMessage(roundStartSeed, GameMain.GameSession.Level.Seed, GameMain.GameSession, connectedClient, true);
730 }
731 }
732 break;
733 case ClientPacketHeader.REQUEST_STARTGAMEFINALIZE:
734 if (connectedClient == null)
735 {
736 DebugConsole.AddWarning("Received a REQUEST_STARTGAMEFINALIZE message. Client not connected, ignoring the message.");
737 }
738 else if (!gameStarted)
739 {
740 DebugConsole.AddWarning("Received a REQUEST_STARTGAMEFINALIZE message. Game not started, ignoring the message.");
741 }
742 else
743 {
744 SendRoundStartFinalize(connectedClient);
745 }
746 break;
747 case ClientPacketHeader.UPDATE_LOBBY:
748 ClientReadLobby(inc);
749 break;
750 case ClientPacketHeader.UPDATE_INGAME:
751 if (!gameStarted) { return; }
752 ClientReadIngame(inc);
753 break;
754 case ClientPacketHeader.CAMPAIGN_SETUP_INFO:
755 bool isNew = inc.ReadBoolean(); inc.ReadPadBits();
756 if (isNew)
757 {
758 string saveName = inc.ReadString();
759 string seed = inc.ReadString();
760 string subName = inc.ReadString();
761 string subHash = inc.ReadString();
762 CampaignSettings settings = new CampaignSettings(inc);
763
764 var matchingSub = SubmarineInfo.SavedSubmarines.FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name == subName && s.MD5Hash.StringRepresentation == subHash);
765
766 if (gameStarted)
767 {
768 SendDirectChatMessage(TextManager.Get("CampaignStartFailedRoundRunning").Value, connectedClient, ChatMessageType.MessageBox);
769 return;
770 }
771
772 if (matchingSub == null)
773 {
774 SendDirectChatMessage(
775 TextManager.GetWithVariable("CampaignStartFailedSubNotFound", "[subname]", subName).Value,
776 connectedClient, ChatMessageType.MessageBox);
777 }
778 else
779 {
780 string localSavePath = SaveUtil.CreateSavePath(SaveUtil.SaveType.Multiplayer, saveName);
781 if (connectedClient.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.SelectMode) || connectedClient.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageCampaign))
782 {
783 ServerSettings.RadiationEnabled = settings.RadiationEnabled;
784 ServerSettings.MaxMissionCount = settings.MaxMissionCount;
785 ServerSettings.SaveSettings();
786 MultiPlayerCampaign.StartNewCampaign(localSavePath, matchingSub.FilePath, seed, settings);
787 }
788 }
789 }
790 else
791 {
792 string saveName = inc.ReadString();
793 if (gameStarted)
794 {
795 SendDirectChatMessage(TextManager.Get("CampaignStartFailedRoundRunning").Value, connectedClient, ChatMessageType.MessageBox);
796 return;
797 }
798 if (connectedClient.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.SelectMode) || connectedClient.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageCampaign)) { MultiPlayerCampaign.LoadCampaign(saveName); }
799 }
800 break;
801 case ClientPacketHeader.VOICE:
802 if (serverSettings.VoiceChatEnabled && !connectedClient.Muted)
803 {
804 byte id = inc.ReadByte();
805 if (connectedClient.ID != id)
806 {
807#if DEBUG
808 DebugConsole.ThrowError(
809 "Client \"" + connectedClient.Name + "\" sent a VOIP update that didn't match its ID (" + id.ToString() + "!=" + connectedClient.ID.ToString() + ")");
810#endif
811 return;
812 }
813 connectedClient.VoipQueue.Read(inc);
814 }
815 break;
816 case ClientPacketHeader.SERVER_SETTINGS:
817 serverSettings.ServerRead(inc, connectedClient);
818 break;
819 case ClientPacketHeader.SERVER_COMMAND:
820 ClientReadServerCommand(inc);
821 break;
822 case ClientPacketHeader.CREW:
823 ReadCrewMessage(inc, connectedClient);
824 break;
825 case ClientPacketHeader.TRANSFER_MONEY:
826 ReadMoneyMessage(inc, connectedClient);
827 break;
828 case ClientPacketHeader.REWARD_DISTRIBUTION:
829 ReadRewardDistributionMessage(inc, connectedClient);
830 break;
831 case ClientPacketHeader.MEDICAL:
832 ReadMedicalMessage(inc, connectedClient);
833 break;
834 case ClientPacketHeader.READY_CHECK:
835 ReadyCheck.ServerRead(inc, connectedClient);
836 break;
837 case ClientPacketHeader.READY_TO_SPAWN:
838 ReadReadyToSpawnMessage(inc, connectedClient);
839 break;
840 case ClientPacketHeader.FILE_REQUEST:
841 if (serverSettings.AllowFileTransfers)
842 {
843 FileSender.ReadFileRequest(inc, connectedClient);
844 }
845 break;
846 case ClientPacketHeader.EVENTMANAGER_RESPONSE:
847 GameMain.GameSession?.EventManager.ServerRead(inc, connectedClient);
848 break;
849 case ClientPacketHeader.ERROR:
850 HandleClientError(inc, connectedClient);
851 break;
852 }
853 }
854
855 private void HandleClientError(IReadMessage inc, Client c)
856 {
857 string errorStr = "Unhandled error report";
858 string errorStrNoName = errorStr;
859
860 ClientNetError error = (ClientNetError)inc.ReadByte();
861 switch (error)
862 {
863 case ClientNetError.MISSING_EVENT:
864 UInt16 expectedID = inc.ReadUInt16();
865 UInt16 receivedID = inc.ReadUInt16();
866 errorStr = errorStrNoName = "Expecting event id " + expectedID.ToString() + ", received " + receivedID.ToString();
867 break;
868 case ClientNetError.MISSING_ENTITY:
869 UInt16 eventID = inc.ReadUInt16();
870 UInt16 entityID = inc.ReadUInt16();
871 byte subCount = inc.ReadByte();
872 List<string> subNames = new List<string>();
873 for (int i = 0; i < subCount; i++)
874 {
875 subNames.Add(inc.ReadString());
876 }
877 Entity entity = Entity.FindEntityByID(entityID);
878 if (entity == null)
879 {
880 errorStr = errorStrNoName = "Received an update for an entity that doesn't exist (event id " + eventID.ToString() + ", entity id " + entityID.ToString() + ").";
881 }
882 else if (entity is Character character)
883 {
884 errorStr = $"Missing character {character.Name} (event id {eventID}, entity id {entityID}).";
885 errorStrNoName = $"Missing character {character.SpeciesName} (event id {eventID}, entity id {entityID}).";
886 }
887 else if (entity is Item item)
888 {
889 errorStr = errorStrNoName = $"Missing item {item.Name}, sub: {item.Submarine?.Info?.Name ?? "none"} (event id {eventID}, entity id {entityID}).";
890 }
891 else
892 {
893 errorStr = errorStrNoName = $"Missing entity {entity}, sub: {entity.Submarine?.Info?.Name ?? "none"} (event id {eventID}, entity id {entityID}).";
894 }
895 if (gameStarted)
896 {
897 var serverSubNames = Submarine.Loaded.Select(s => s.Info.Name);
898 if (subCount != Submarine.Loaded.Count || !subNames.SequenceEqual(serverSubNames))
899 {
900 string subErrorStr = $" Loaded submarines don't match (client: {string.Join(", ", subNames)}, server: {string.Join(", ", serverSubNames)}).";
901 errorStr += subErrorStr;
902 errorStrNoName += subErrorStr;
903 }
904 }
905 break;
906 }
907
908 Log(ClientLogName(c) + " has reported an error: " + errorStr, ServerLog.MessageType.Error);
909 GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("GameServer.HandleClientError:" + errorStrNoName, GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error, errorStr);
910
911 try
912 {
913 WriteEventErrorData(c, errorStr);
914 }
915 catch (Exception e)
916 {
917 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Failed to write event error data", e);
918 }
919
920 if (c.Connection == OwnerConnection)
921 {
922 SendDirectChatMessage(errorStr, c, ChatMessageType.MessageBox);
923 EndGame(wasSaved: false);
924 }
925 else
926 {
927 KickClient(c, errorStr);
928 }
929
930 }
931
932 private void WriteEventErrorData(Client client, string errorStr)
933 {
934 if (!Directory.Exists(ServerLog.SavePath))
935 {
936 Directory.CreateDirectory(ServerLog.SavePath);
937 }
938
939 string filePath = $"event_error_log_server_{client.Name}_{DateTime.UtcNow.ToShortTimeString()}.log";
940 filePath = Path.Combine(ServerLog.SavePath, ToolBox.RemoveInvalidFileNameChars(filePath));
941 if (File.Exists(filePath)) { return; }
942
943 List<string> errorLines = new List<string>
944 {
945 errorStr, ""
946 };
947
948 if (GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode != null)
949 {
950 errorLines.Add("Game mode: " + GameMain.GameSession.GameMode.Name.Value);
951 if (GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode is MultiPlayerCampaign campaign)
952 {
953 errorLines.Add("Campaign ID: " + campaign.CampaignID);
954 errorLines.Add("Campaign save ID: " + campaign.LastSaveID);
955 }
956 foreach (Mission mission in GameMain.GameSession.Missions)
957 {
958 errorLines.Add("Mission: " + mission.Prefab.Identifier);
959 }
960 }
961 if (GameMain.GameSession?.Submarine != null)
962 {
963 errorLines.Add("Submarine: " + GameMain.GameSession.Submarine.Info.Name);
964 }
965 if (GameMain.NetworkMember?.RespawnManager?.RespawnShuttle != null)
966 {
967 errorLines.Add("Respawn shuttle: " + GameMain.NetworkMember.RespawnManager.RespawnShuttle.Info.Name);
968 }
969 if (Level.Loaded != null)
970 {
971 errorLines.Add("Level: " + Level.Loaded.Seed + ", " + string.Join(", ", Level.Loaded.EqualityCheckValues.Select(cv => cv.ToString("X"))));
972 errorLines.Add("Entity count before generating level: " + Level.Loaded.EntityCountBeforeGenerate);
973 errorLines.Add("Entities:");
974 foreach (Entity e in Level.Loaded.EntitiesBeforeGenerate.OrderBy(e => e.CreationIndex))
975 {
976 errorLines.Add(e.ErrorLine);
977 }
978 errorLines.Add("Entity count after generating level: " + Level.Loaded.EntityCountAfterGenerate);
979 }
980
981 errorLines.Add("Entity IDs:");
982 Entity[] sortedEntities = Entity.GetEntities().OrderBy(e => e.CreationIndex).ToArray();
983 foreach (Entity e in sortedEntities)
984 {
985 errorLines.Add(e.ErrorLine);
986 }
987
988 errorLines.Add("");
989 errorLines.Add("EntitySpawner events:");
990 foreach (var entityEvent in entityEventManager.UniqueEvents)
991 {
992 if (entityEvent.Entity is EntitySpawner)
993 {
994 var spawnData = entityEvent.Data as EntitySpawner.SpawnOrRemove;
995 errorLines.Add(
996 entityEvent.ID + ": " +
997 (spawnData is EntitySpawner.RemoveEntity ? "Remove " : "Create ") +
998 spawnData.Entity.ToString() +
999 " (" + spawnData.ID + ", " + spawnData.Entity.ID + ")");
1000 }
1001 }
1002
1003 errorLines.Add("");
1004 errorLines.Add("Last debug messages:");
1005 for (int i = DebugConsole.Messages.Count - 1; i > 0 && i > DebugConsole.Messages.Count - 15; i--)
1006 {
1007 errorLines.Add(" " + DebugConsole.Messages[i].Time + " - " + DebugConsole.Messages[i].Text);
1008 }
1009
1010 File.WriteAllLines(filePath, errorLines);
1011 }

1013 public override void CreateEntityEvent(INetSerializable entity, NetEntityEvent.IData extraData = null)
1014 {
1015 if (!(entity is IServerSerializable serverSerializable))
1016 {
1017 throw new InvalidCastException($"Entity is not {nameof(IServerSerializable)}");
1018 }
1019 entityEventManager.CreateEvent(serverSerializable, extraData);
1020 }

1022 private byte GetNewClientID()
1023 {
1024 byte userID = 1;
1025 while (connectedClients.Any(c => c.ID == userID))
1026 {
1027 userID++;
1028 }
1029 return userID;
1030 }
1031
1032 private void ClientReadLobby(IReadMessage inc)
1033 {
1034 Client c = ConnectedClients.Find(x => x.Connection == inc.Sender);
1035 if (c == null)
1036 {
1037 //TODO: remove?
1038 //inc.Sender.Disconnect("You're not a connected client.");
1039 return;
1040 }
1041
1042 ClientNetObject objHeader;
1043 while ((objHeader = (ClientNetObject)inc.ReadByte()) != ClientNetObject.END_OF_MESSAGE)
1044 {
1045 switch (objHeader)
1046 {
1047 case ClientNetObject.SYNC_IDS:
1048 //TODO: might want to use a clever class for this
1049 c.LastRecvLobbyUpdate = NetIdUtils.Clamp(inc.ReadUInt16(), c.LastRecvLobbyUpdate, GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.LastUpdateID);
1050 if (c.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ManageSettings) &&
1051 NetIdUtils.IdMoreRecentOrMatches(c.LastRecvLobbyUpdate, c.LastSentServerSettingsUpdate))
1052 {
1053 c.LastRecvServerSettingsUpdate = c.LastSentServerSettingsUpdate;
1054 }
1055 c.LastRecvChatMsgID = NetIdUtils.Clamp(inc.ReadUInt16(), c.LastRecvChatMsgID, c.LastChatMsgQueueID);
1056 c.LastRecvClientListUpdate = NetIdUtils.Clamp(inc.ReadUInt16(), c.LastRecvClientListUpdate, LastClientListUpdateID);
1057
1058 TryChangeClientName(c, inc);
1059
1060 c.LastRecvCampaignSave = inc.ReadUInt16();
1061 if (c.LastRecvCampaignSave > 0)
1062 {
1063 byte campaignID = inc.ReadByte();
1064 c.LastRecvCampaignUpdate = inc.ReadUInt16();
1065 bool characterDiscarded = inc.ReadBoolean();
1066
1067 if (GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode is MultiPlayerCampaign campaign)
1068 {
1069 if (characterDiscarded) { campaign.DiscardClientCharacterData(c); }
1070 //the client has a campaign save for another campaign
1071 //(the server started a new campaign and the client isn't aware of it yet?)
1072 if (campaign.CampaignID != campaignID)
1073 {
1074 c.LastRecvCampaignSave = (ushort)(campaign.LastSaveID - 1);
1075 c.LastRecvCampaignUpdate = (ushort)(campaign.LastUpdateID - 1);
1076 }
1077 }
1078 }
1079 break;
1080 case ClientNetObject.CHAT_MESSAGE:
1081 ChatMessage.ServerRead(inc, c);
1082 break;
1083 case ClientNetObject.VOTE:
1084 Voting.ServerRead(inc, c);
1085 break;
1086 default:
1087 return;
1088 }
1089
1090 //don't read further messages if the client has been disconnected (kicked due to spam for example)
1091 if (!connectedClients.Contains(c)) break;
1092 }
1093 }
1094
1095 private void ClientReadIngame(IReadMessage inc)
1096 {
1097 Client c = ConnectedClients.Find(x => x.Connection == inc.Sender);
1098 if (c == null)
1099 {
1100 //TODO: remove?
1101 //inc.SenderConnection.Disconnect("You're not a connected client.");
1102 return;
1103 }
1104
1105 bool midroundSyncingDone = inc.ReadBoolean();
1106 inc.ReadPadBits();
1107 if (gameStarted)
1108 {
1109 if (!c.InGame)
1110 {
1111 //check if midround syncing is needed due to missed unique events
1112 if (!midroundSyncingDone) { entityEventManager.InitClientMidRoundSync(c); }
1113 c.InGame = true;
1114 }
1115 }
1116
1117 ClientNetObject objHeader;
1118 while ((objHeader = (ClientNetObject)inc.ReadByte()) != ClientNetObject.END_OF_MESSAGE)
1119 {
1120 switch (objHeader)
1121 {
1122 case ClientNetObject.SYNC_IDS:
1123 //TODO: might want to use a clever class for this
1124
1125 UInt16 lastRecvChatMsgID = inc.ReadUInt16();
1126 UInt16 lastRecvEntityEventID = inc.ReadUInt16();
1127 UInt16 lastRecvClientListUpdate = inc.ReadUInt16();
1128
1129 //last msgs we've created/sent, the client IDs should never be higher than these
1130 UInt16 lastEntityEventID = entityEventManager.Events.Count == 0 ? (UInt16)0 : entityEventManager.Events.Last().ID;
1131
1132 c.LastRecvCampaignSave = inc.ReadUInt16();
1133 if (c.LastRecvCampaignSave > 0)
1134 {
1135 byte campaignID = inc.ReadByte();
1136 c.LastRecvCampaignUpdate = inc.ReadUInt16();
1137 bool characterDiscarded = inc.ReadBoolean();
1138
1139 if (GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode is MultiPlayerCampaign campaign)
1140 {
1141 if (characterDiscarded) { campaign.DiscardClientCharacterData(c); }
1142 //the client has a campaign save for another campaign
1143 //(the server started a new campaign and the client isn't aware of it yet?)
1144 if (campaign.CampaignID != campaignID)
1145 {
1146 c.LastRecvCampaignSave = (ushort)(campaign.LastSaveID - 1);
1147 c.LastRecvCampaignUpdate = (ushort)(campaign.LastUpdateID - 1);
1148 }
1149 }
1150 }
1151
1152 if (c.NeedsMidRoundSync)
1153 {
1154 //received all the old events -> client in sync, we can switch to normal behavior
1155 if (lastRecvEntityEventID >= c.UnreceivedEntityEventCount - 1 ||
1156 c.UnreceivedEntityEventCount == 0)
1157 {
1158 ushort prevID = lastRecvEntityEventID;
1159 c.NeedsMidRoundSync = false;
1160 lastRecvEntityEventID = (UInt16)(c.FirstNewEventID - 1);
1161 c.LastRecvEntityEventID = lastRecvEntityEventID;
1162 DebugConsole.Log("Finished midround syncing " + c.Name + " - switching from ID " + prevID + " to " + c.LastRecvEntityEventID);
1163 //notify the client of the state of the respawn manager (so they show the respawn prompt if needed)
1164 if (respawnManager != null) { CreateEntityEvent(respawnManager); }
1165 }
1166 else
1167 {
1168 lastEntityEventID = (UInt16)(c.UnreceivedEntityEventCount - 1);
1169 }
1170 }
1171
1172 if (NetIdUtils.IsValidId(lastRecvChatMsgID, c.LastRecvChatMsgID, c.LastChatMsgQueueID))
1173 {
1174 c.LastRecvChatMsgID = lastRecvChatMsgID;
1175 }
1176 else if (lastRecvChatMsgID != c.LastRecvChatMsgID && GameSettings.CurrentConfig.VerboseLogging)
1177 {
1178 DebugConsole.ThrowError(
1179 "Invalid lastRecvChatMsgID " + lastRecvChatMsgID +
1180 " (previous: " + c.LastChatMsgQueueID + ", latest: " + c.LastChatMsgQueueID + ")");
1181 }
1182
1183 if (NetIdUtils.IsValidId(lastRecvEntityEventID, c.LastRecvEntityEventID, lastEntityEventID))
1184 {
1185 if (c.NeedsMidRoundSync)
1186 {
1187 //give midround-joining clients a bit more time to get in sync if they keep receiving messages
1188 int receivedEventCount = lastRecvEntityEventID - c.LastRecvEntityEventID;
1189 if (receivedEventCount < 0) receivedEventCount += ushort.MaxValue;
1190 c.MidRoundSyncTimeOut += receivedEventCount * 0.01f;
1191 DebugConsole.Log("Midround sync timeout " + c.MidRoundSyncTimeOut.ToString("0.##") + "/" + Timing.TotalTime.ToString("0.##"));
1192 }
1193
1194 c.LastRecvEntityEventID = lastRecvEntityEventID;
1195 #warning TODO: remove this later
1196 /*if (!CoroutineManager.IsCoroutineRunning("RoundRestartLoop"))
1197 {
1198 CoroutineManager.StartCoroutine(RoundRestartLoop(), "RoundRestartLoop");
1199 }*/
1200 }
1201 else if (lastRecvEntityEventID != c.LastRecvEntityEventID && GameSettings.CurrentConfig.VerboseLogging)
1202 {
1203 DebugConsole.ThrowError(
1204 "Invalid lastRecvEntityEventID " + lastRecvEntityEventID +
1205 " (previous: " + c.LastRecvEntityEventID + ", latest: " + lastEntityEventID + ")");
1206 }
1207
1208 if (NetIdUtils.IdMoreRecent(lastRecvClientListUpdate, c.LastRecvClientListUpdate))
1209 {
1210 c.LastRecvClientListUpdate = lastRecvClientListUpdate;
1211 }
1212
1213 break;
1214 case ClientNetObject.CHAT_MESSAGE:
1215 ChatMessage.ServerRead(inc, c);
1216 break;
1217 case ClientNetObject.CHARACTER_INPUT:
1218 if (c.Character != null)
1219 {
1220 c.Character.ServerReadInput(inc, c);
1221 }
1222 else
1223 {
1224 DebugConsole.AddWarning($"Received character inputs from a client who's not controlling a character ({c.Name}).");
1225 }
1226 break;
1227 case ClientNetObject.ENTITY_STATE:
1228 entityEventManager.Read(inc, c);
1229 break;
1230 case ClientNetObject.VOTE:
1231 Voting.ServerRead(inc, c);
1232 break;
1233 case ClientNetObject.SPECTATING_POS:
1234 c.SpectatePos = new Vector2(inc.ReadSingle(), inc.ReadSingle());
1235 break;
1236 default:
1237 return;
1238 }
1239
1240 //don't read further messages if the client has been disconnected (kicked due to spam for example)
1241 if (!connectedClients.Contains(c)) break;
1242 }
1243 }

1277 private void ReadReadyToSpawnMessage(IReadMessage inc, Client sender)
1278 {
1279 sender.SpectateOnly = inc.ReadBoolean() && (serverSettings.AllowSpectating || sender.Connection == OwnerConnection);
1280 sender.WaitForNextRoundRespawn = inc.ReadBoolean();
1281 if (!(GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode is CampaignMode))
1282 {
1283 sender.WaitForNextRoundRespawn = null;
1284 }

1286
1287 private void ClientReadServerCommand(IReadMessage inc)
1288 {
1289 Client sender = ConnectedClients.Find(x => x.Connection == inc.Sender);
1290 if (sender == null)
1291 {
1292 //TODO: remove?
1293 //inc.SenderConnection.Disconnect("You're not a connected client.");
1294 return;
1295 }
1296
1297 ClientPermissions command = ClientPermissions.None;
1298 try
1299 {
1300 command = (ClientPermissions)inc.ReadUInt16();
1301 }
1302 catch
1303 {
1304 return;
1305 }
1306
1307 var mpCampaign = GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode as MultiPlayerCampaign;
1308 if (command == ClientPermissions.ManageRound && mpCampaign != null)
1309 {
1310 //do nothing, ending campaign rounds is checked in more detail below
1311 }
1312 else if (command == ClientPermissions.ManageCampaign && mpCampaign != null)
1313 {
1314 //do nothing, campaign permissions are checked in more detail in MultiplayerCampaign.ServerRead
1315 }
1316 else if (!sender.HasPermission(command))
1317 {
1318 Log("Client \"" + GameServer.ClientLogName(sender) + "\" sent a server command \"" + command + "\". Permission denied.", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
1319 return;
1320 }
1321
1322 switch (command)
1323 {
1324 case ClientPermissions.Kick:
1325 string kickedName = inc.ReadString().ToLowerInvariant();
1326 string kickReason = inc.ReadString();
1327 var kickedClient = connectedClients.Find(cl => cl != sender && cl.Name.Equals(kickedName, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) && cl.Connection != OwnerConnection);
1328 if (kickedClient != null)
1329 {
1330 Log("Client \"" + GameServer.ClientLogName(sender) + "\" kicked \"" + GameServer.ClientLogName(kickedClient) + "\".", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
1331 KickClient(kickedClient, string.IsNullOrEmpty(kickReason) ? $"ServerMessage.KickedBy~[initiator]={sender.Name}" : kickReason);
1332 }
1333 else
1334 {
1335 SendDirectChatMessage(TextManager.GetServerMessage($"ServerMessage.PlayerNotFound~[player]={kickedName}").Value, sender, ChatMessageType.Console);
1336 }
1337 break;
1338 case ClientPermissions.Ban:
1339 string bannedName = inc.ReadString().ToLowerInvariant();
1340 string banReason = inc.ReadString();
1341 bool range = inc.ReadBoolean();
1342 double durationSeconds = inc.ReadDouble();
1343
1344 TimeSpan? banDuration = null;
1345 if (durationSeconds > 0) { banDuration = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(durationSeconds); }
1346
1347 var bannedClient = connectedClients.Find(cl => cl != sender && cl.Name.Equals(bannedName, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) && cl.Connection != OwnerConnection);
1348 if (bannedClient != null)
1349 {
1350 Log("Client \"" + ClientLogName(sender) + "\" banned \"" + ClientLogName(bannedClient) + "\".", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
1351 BanClient(bannedClient, string.IsNullOrEmpty(banReason) ? $"ServerMessage.BannedBy~[initiator]={sender.Name}" : banReason, range, banDuration);
1352 }
1353 else
1354 {
1355 var bannedPreviousClient = previousPlayers.Find(p => p.Name.Equals(bannedName, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase));
1356 if (bannedPreviousClient != null)
1357 {
1358 Log("Client \"" + ClientLogName(sender) + "\" banned \"" + bannedPreviousClient.Name + "\".", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
1359 BanPreviousPlayer(bannedPreviousClient, string.IsNullOrEmpty(banReason) ? $"ServerMessage.BannedBy~[initiator]={sender.Name}" : banReason, range, banDuration);
1360 }
1361 else
1362 {
1363 SendDirectChatMessage(TextManager.GetServerMessage($"ServerMessage.PlayerNotFound~[player]={bannedName}").Value, sender, ChatMessageType.Console);
1364 }
1365 }
1366 break;
1367 case ClientPermissions.Unban:
1368 string unbannedName = inc.ReadString();
1369 string unbannedIP = inc.ReadString();
1370 UnbanPlayer(unbannedName, unbannedIP);
1371 break;
1372 case ClientPermissions.ManageRound:
1373 bool end = inc.ReadBoolean();
1374 if (end)
1375 {
1376 if (mpCampaign == null ||
1377 mpCampaign.AllowedToManageCampaign(sender, ClientPermissions.ManageRound) ||
1378 mpCampaign.AllowedToManageCampaign(sender, ClientPermissions.ManageCampaign))
1379 {
1380 bool save = inc.ReadBoolean();
1381 if (gameStarted)
1382 {
1383 Log("Client \"" + GameServer.ClientLogName(sender) + "\" ended the round.", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
1384 if (mpCampaign != null && Level.IsLoadedOutpost && save)
1385 {
1386 mpCampaign.SavePlayers();
1387 GameMain.GameSession.SubmarineInfo = new SubmarineInfo(GameMain.GameSession.Submarine);
1388 SaveUtil.SaveGame(GameMain.GameSession.SavePath);
1389 }
1390 else
1391 {
1392 save = false;
1393 }
1394 EndGame(wasSaved: save);
1395 }
1396 }
1397 }
1398 else
1399 {
1400 bool continueCampaign = inc.ReadBoolean();
1401 if (mpCampaign != null && mpCampaign.GameOver || continueCampaign)
1402 {
1403 if (gameStarted)
1404 {
1405 SendDirectChatMessage("Cannot continue the campaign from the previous save (round already running).", sender, ChatMessageType.Error);
1406 break;
1407 }
1408 else if (mpCampaign.AllowedToManageCampaign(sender, ClientPermissions.ManageCampaign) || mpCampaign.AllowedToManageCampaign(sender, ClientPermissions.ManageMap))
1409 {
1410 MultiPlayerCampaign.LoadCampaign(GameMain.GameSession.SavePath);
1411 }
1412
1413 }
1414 else if (!gameStarted && !initiatedStartGame)
1415 {
1416 Log("Client \"" + ClientLogName(sender) + "\" started the round.", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
1417 StartGame();
1418 }
1419 else if (mpCampaign != null && (mpCampaign.AllowedToManageCampaign(sender, ClientPermissions.ManageCampaign) || mpCampaign.AllowedToManageCampaign(sender, ClientPermissions.ManageMap)))
1420 {
1421 var availableTransition = mpCampaign.GetAvailableTransition(out _, out _);
1422 //don't force location if we've teleported
1423 bool forceLocation = !mpCampaign.Map.AllowDebugTeleport || mpCampaign.Map.CurrentLocation == Level.Loaded.StartLocation;
1424 switch (availableTransition)
1425 {
1426 case CampaignMode.TransitionType.ReturnToPreviousEmptyLocation:
1427 if (forceLocation)
1428 {
1429 mpCampaign.Map.SelectLocation(
1430 mpCampaign.Map.CurrentLocation.Connections.Find(c => c.LevelData == Level.Loaded?.LevelData).OtherLocation(mpCampaign.Map.CurrentLocation));
1431 }
1432 mpCampaign.LoadNewLevel();
1433 break;
1434 case CampaignMode.TransitionType.ProgressToNextEmptyLocation:
1435 if (forceLocation)
1436 {
1437 mpCampaign.Map.SetLocation(mpCampaign.Map.Locations.IndexOf(Level.Loaded.EndLocation));
1438 }
1439 mpCampaign.LoadNewLevel();
1440 break;
1441 case CampaignMode.TransitionType.None:
1442#if DEBUG || UNSTABLE
1443 DebugConsole.ThrowError($"Client \"{sender.Name}\" attempted to trigger a level transition. No transitions available.");
1444#endif
1445 return;
1446 default:
1447 Log("Client \"" + ClientLogName(sender) + "\" ended the round.", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
1448 mpCampaign.LoadNewLevel();
1449 break;
1450 }
1451 }
1452 }
1453 break;
1454 case ClientPermissions.SelectSub:
1455 bool isShuttle = inc.ReadBoolean();
1456 inc.ReadPadBits();
1457 UInt16 subIndex = inc.ReadUInt16();
1458 var subList = GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.GetSubList();
1459 if (subIndex >= subList.Count)
1460 {
1461 DebugConsole.NewMessage($"Client \"{ClientLogName(sender)}\" attempted to select a sub, index out of bounds ({subIndex})", Color.Red);
1462 }
1463 else
1464 {
1465 if (isShuttle)
1466 {
1467 GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedShuttle = subList[subIndex];
1468 }
1469 else
1470 {
1471 GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedSub = subList[subIndex];
1472 }
1473 }
1474 break;
1475 case ClientPermissions.SelectMode:
1476 UInt16 modeIndex = inc.ReadUInt16();
1477 GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedModeIndex = modeIndex;
1478 Log("Gamemode changed to " + GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.GameModes[GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedModeIndex].Name.Value, ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
1479
1480 if (GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.GameModes[modeIndex].Identifier == "multiplayercampaign")
1481 {
1482 const int MaxSaves = 255;
1483 var saveInfos = SaveUtil.GetSaveFiles(SaveUtil.SaveType.Multiplayer, includeInCompatible: false);
1484 IWriteMessage msg = new WriteOnlyMessage();
1485 msg.Write((byte)ServerPacketHeader.CAMPAIGN_SETUP_INFO);
1486 msg.Write((byte)Math.Min(saveInfos.Count, MaxSaves));
1487 for (int i = 0; i < saveInfos.Count && i < MaxSaves; i++)
1488 {
1489 msg.Write(saveInfos[i]);
1490 }
1491 serverPeer.Send(msg, sender.Connection, DeliveryMethod.Reliable);
1492 }
1493 break;
1494 case ClientPermissions.ManageCampaign:
1495 mpCampaign?.ServerRead(inc, sender);
1496 break;
1497 case ClientPermissions.ConsoleCommands:
1498 {
1499 string consoleCommand = inc.ReadString();
1500 Vector2 clientCursorPos = new Vector2(inc.ReadSingle(), inc.ReadSingle());
1501 DebugConsole.ExecuteClientCommand(sender, clientCursorPos, consoleCommand);
1502 }
1503 break;
1504 case ClientPermissions.ManagePermissions:
1505 byte targetClientID = inc.ReadByte();
1506 Client targetClient = connectedClients.Find(c => c.ID == targetClientID);
1507 if (targetClient == null || targetClient == sender || targetClient.Connection == OwnerConnection) { return; }
1508
1509 targetClient.ReadPermissions(inc);
1510
1511 List<string> permissionNames = new List<string>();
1512 foreach (ClientPermissions permission in Enum.GetValues(typeof(ClientPermissions)))
1513 {
1514 if (permission == ClientPermissions.None || permission == ClientPermissions.All)
1515 {
1516 continue;
1517 }
1518 if (targetClient.Permissions.HasFlag(permission)) { permissionNames.Add(permission.ToString()); }
1519 }
1520
1521 string logMsg;
1522 if (permissionNames.Any())
1523 {
1524 logMsg = "Client \"" + GameServer.ClientLogName(sender) + "\" set the permissions of the client \"" + GameServer.ClientLogName(targetClient) + "\" to "
1525 + string.Join(", ", permissionNames);
1526 }
1527 else
1528 {
1529 logMsg = "Client \"" + GameServer.ClientLogName(sender) + "\" removed all permissions from the client \"" + GameServer.ClientLogName(targetClient) + ".";
1530 }
1531 Log(logMsg, ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
1532
1533 UpdateClientPermissions(targetClient);
1534
1535 break;
1536 }
1537
1538 inc.ReadPadBits();
1539 }
1540
1541 private void ClientWrite(Client c)
1542 {
1543 if (gameStarted && c.InGame)
1544 {
1545 ClientWriteIngame(c);
1546 }
1547 else
1548 {
1549 //if 30 seconds have passed since the round started and the client isn't ingame yet,
1550 //consider the client's character disconnected (causing it to die if the client does not join soon)
1551 if (gameStarted && c.Character != null && (DateTime.Now - roundStartTime).Seconds > 30.0f)
1552 {
1553 c.Character.ClientDisconnected = true;
1554 }
1555
1556 ClientWriteLobby(c);
1557
1558 }
1559 if (GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode is MultiPlayerCampaign campaign &&
1560 GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedMode == campaign.Preset &&
1561 NetIdUtils.IdMoreRecent(campaign.LastSaveID, c.LastRecvCampaignSave))
1562 {
1563 //already sent an up-to-date campaign save
1564 if (c.LastCampaignSaveSendTime != null && campaign.LastSaveID == c.LastCampaignSaveSendTime.First)
1565 {
1566 //the save was sent less than 5 second ago, don't attempt to resend yet
1567 //(the client may have received it but hasn't acked us yet)
1568 if (c.LastCampaignSaveSendTime.Second > NetTime.Now - 5.0f)
1569 {
1570 return;
1571 }
1572 }
1573
1574 if (!FileSender.ActiveTransfers.Any(t => t.Connection == c.Connection && t.FileType == FileTransferType.CampaignSave))
1575 {
1576 FileSender.StartTransfer(c.Connection, FileTransferType.CampaignSave, GameMain.GameSession.SavePath);
1577 c.LastCampaignSaveSendTime = new Pair<ushort, float>(campaign.LastSaveID, (float)NetTime.Now);
1578 }
1579 }
1580 }
1581
1585 private void ClientWriteInitial(Client c, IWriteMessage outmsg)
1586 {
1587 if (GameSettings.CurrentConfig.VerboseLogging)
1588 {
1589 DebugConsole.NewMessage("Sending initial lobby update", Color.Gray);
1590 }
1591
1592 outmsg.Write(c.ID);
1593
1594 var subList = GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.GetSubList();
1595 outmsg.Write((UInt16)subList.Count);
1596 for (int i = 0; i < subList.Count; i++)
1597 {
1598 outmsg.Write(subList[i].Name);
1599 outmsg.Write(subList[i].MD5Hash.ToString());
1600 outmsg.Write((byte)subList[i].SubmarineClass);
1601 outmsg.Write(subList[i].RequiredContentPackagesInstalled);
1602 }
1603
1604 outmsg.Write(GameStarted);
1605 outmsg.Write(serverSettings.AllowSpectating);
1606
1607 c.WritePermissions(outmsg);
1608 }
1609
1610 private void ClientWriteIngame(Client c)
1611 {
1612 //don't send position updates to characters who are still midround syncing
1613 //characters or items spawned mid-round don't necessarily exist at the client's end yet
1614 if (!c.NeedsMidRoundSync)
1615 {
1616 foreach (Character character in Character.CharacterList)
1617 {
1618 if (!character.Enabled) { continue; }
1619 if (c.SpectatePos == null)
1620 {
1621 float distSqr = Vector2.DistanceSquared(character.WorldPosition, c.Character.WorldPosition);
1622 if (c.Character.ViewTarget != null)
1623 {
1624 distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(character.WorldPosition, c.Character.ViewTarget.WorldPosition));
1625 }
1626 if (distSqr >= MathUtils.Pow2(character.Params.DisableDistance)) { continue; }
1627 }
1628 else
1629 {
1630 if (character != c.Character && Vector2.DistanceSquared(character.WorldPosition, c.SpectatePos.Value) >= MathUtils.Pow2(character.Params.DisableDistance))
1631 {
1632 continue;
1633 }
1634 }
1635
1636 float updateInterval = character.GetPositionUpdateInterval(c);
1637 c.PositionUpdateLastSent.TryGetValue(character, out float lastSent);
1638 if (lastSent > NetTime.Now)
1639 {
1640 //sent in the future -> can't be right, remove
1641 c.PositionUpdateLastSent.Remove(character);
1642 }
1643 else
1644 {
1645 if (lastSent > NetTime.Now - updateInterval) { continue; }
1646 }
1647 if (!c.PendingPositionUpdates.Contains(character)) { c.PendingPositionUpdates.Enqueue(character); }
1648 }
1649
1650 foreach (Submarine sub in Submarine.Loaded)
1651 {
1652 //if docked to a sub with a smaller ID, don't send an update
1653 // (= update is only sent for the docked sub that has the smallest ID, doesn't matter if it's the main sub or a shuttle)
1654 if (sub.Info.IsOutpost || sub.DockedTo.Any(s => s.ID < sub.ID)) { continue; }
1655 if (sub.PhysicsBody == null || sub.PhysicsBody.BodyType == FarseerPhysics.BodyType.Static) { continue; }
1656 if (!c.PendingPositionUpdates.Contains(sub)) { c.PendingPositionUpdates.Enqueue(sub); }
1657 }
1658
1659 foreach (Item item in Item.ItemList)
1660 {
1661 if (item.PositionUpdateInterval == float.PositiveInfinity) { continue; }
1662 float updateInterval = item.GetPositionUpdateInterval(c);
1663 c.PositionUpdateLastSent.TryGetValue(item, out float lastSent);
1664 if (lastSent > NetTime.Now)
1665 {
1666 //sent in the future -> can't be right, remove
1667 c.PositionUpdateLastSent.Remove(item);
1668 }
1669 else
1670 {
1671 if (lastSent > NetTime.Now - updateInterval) { continue; }
1672 }
1673 if (!c.PendingPositionUpdates.Contains(item)) { c.PendingPositionUpdates.Enqueue(item); }
1674 }
1675 }
1676
1677 IWriteMessage outmsg = new WriteOnlyMessage();
1678 outmsg.Write((byte)ServerPacketHeader.UPDATE_INGAME);
1679
1680 outmsg.Write((float)NetTime.Now);
1681
1682 outmsg.Write((byte)ServerNetObject.SYNC_IDS);
1683 outmsg.Write(c.LastSentChatMsgID); //send this to client so they know which chat messages weren't received by the server
1684 outmsg.Write(c.LastSentEntityEventID);
1685
1686 if (GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode is MultiPlayerCampaign campaign && campaign.Preset == GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedMode &&
1687 NetIdUtils.IdMoreRecent(campaign.LastUpdateID, c.LastRecvCampaignUpdate))
1688 {
1689 outmsg.Write(true);
1690 outmsg.WritePadBits();
1691 campaign.ServerWrite(outmsg, c);
1692 }
1693 else
1694 {
1695 outmsg.Write(false);
1696 outmsg.WritePadBits();
1697 }
1698
1699 int clientListBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes;
1700 WriteClientList(c, outmsg);
1701 clientListBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes - clientListBytes;
1702
1703 int chatMessageBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes;
1704 WriteChatMessages(outmsg, c);
1705 chatMessageBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes - chatMessageBytes;
1706
1707 //write as many position updates as the message can fit (only after midround syncing is done)
1708 int positionUpdateBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes;
1709 while (!c.NeedsMidRoundSync && c.PendingPositionUpdates.Count > 0)
1710 {
1711 var entity = c.PendingPositionUpdates.Peek();
1712 if (!(entity is IServerPositionSync entityPositionSync) ||
1713 entity.Removed ||
1714 (entity is Item item && float.IsInfinity(item.PositionUpdateInterval)))
1715 {
1716 c.PendingPositionUpdates.Dequeue();
1717 continue;
1718 }
1719
1720 IWriteMessage tempBuffer = new ReadWriteMessage();
1721 tempBuffer.Write(entity is Item); tempBuffer.WritePadBits();
1722 tempBuffer.Write(entity is MapEntity me ? me.Prefab.UintIdentifier : (UInt32)0);
1723 entityPositionSync.ServerWritePosition(tempBuffer, c);
1724
1725 //no more room in this packet
1726 if (outmsg.LengthBytes + tempBuffer.LengthBytes > MsgConstants.MTU - 100)
1727 {
1728 break;
1729 }
1730
1731 outmsg.Write((byte)ServerNetObject.ENTITY_POSITION);
1732 outmsg.WritePadBits(); //padding is required here to make sure any padding bits within tempBuffer are read correctly
1733 outmsg.Write(tempBuffer.Buffer, 0, tempBuffer.LengthBytes);
1734 outmsg.WritePadBits();
1735
1736 c.PositionUpdateLastSent[entity] = (float)NetTime.Now;
1737 c.PendingPositionUpdates.Dequeue();
1738 }
1739 positionUpdateBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes - positionUpdateBytes;
1740
1741 outmsg.Write((byte)ServerNetObject.END_OF_MESSAGE);
1742
1743 if (outmsg.LengthBytes > MsgConstants.MTU)
1744 {
1745 string errorMsg = "Maximum packet size exceeded (" + outmsg.LengthBytes + " > " + MsgConstants.MTU + ")\n";
1746 errorMsg +=
1747 " Client list size: " + clientListBytes + " bytes\n" +
1748 " Chat message size: " + chatMessageBytes + " bytes\n" +
1749 " Position update size: " + positionUpdateBytes + " bytes\n\n";
1750 DebugConsole.ThrowError(errorMsg);
1751 GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("GameServer.ClientWriteIngame1:PacketSizeExceeded" + outmsg.LengthBytes, GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error, errorMsg);
1752 }
1753
1754 serverPeer.Send(outmsg, c.Connection, DeliveryMethod.Unreliable);
1755
1756 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
1757
1758 for (int i = 0; i < NetConfig.MaxEventPacketsPerUpdate; i++)
1759 {
1760 outmsg = new WriteOnlyMessage();
1761 outmsg.Write((byte)ServerPacketHeader.UPDATE_INGAME);
1762 outmsg.Write((float)Lidgren.Network.NetTime.Now);
1763
1764 int eventManagerBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes;
1765 entityEventManager.Write(c, outmsg, out List<NetEntityEvent> sentEvents);
1766 eventManagerBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes - eventManagerBytes;
1767
1768 if (sentEvents.Count == 0)
1769 {
1770 break;
1771 }
1772
1773 outmsg.Write((byte)ServerNetObject.END_OF_MESSAGE);
1774
1775 if (outmsg.LengthBytes > MsgConstants.MTU)
1776 {
1777 string errorMsg = "Maximum packet size exceeded (" + outmsg.LengthBytes + " > " + MsgConstants.MTU + ")\n";
1778 errorMsg +=
1779 " Event size: " + eventManagerBytes + " bytes\n";
1780
1781 if (sentEvents != null && sentEvents.Count > 0)
1782 {
1783 errorMsg += "Sent events: \n";
1784 foreach (var entityEvent in sentEvents)
1785 {
1786 errorMsg += " - " + (entityEvent.Entity?.ToString() ?? "null") + "\n";
1787 }
1788 }
1789
1790 DebugConsole.ThrowError(errorMsg);
1791 GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("GameServer.ClientWriteIngame2:PacketSizeExceeded" + outmsg.LengthBytes, GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error, errorMsg);
1792 }
1793
1794 serverPeer.Send(outmsg, c.Connection, DeliveryMethod.Unreliable);
1795 }
1796 }
1797
1798 private void WriteClientList(Client c, IWriteMessage outmsg)
1799 {
1800 bool hasChanged = NetIdUtils.IdMoreRecent(LastClientListUpdateID, c.LastRecvClientListUpdate);
1801 if (!hasChanged) { return; }
1802
1803 outmsg.Write((byte)ServerNetObject.CLIENT_LIST);
1804 outmsg.Write(LastClientListUpdateID);
1805
1806 GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call("writeClientList", c, outmsg);
1807
1808 outmsg.Write((byte)connectedClients.Count);
1809 foreach (Client client in connectedClients)
1810 {
1811 var tempClientData = new TempClient
1812 {
1813 ID = client.ID,
1814 SteamID = client.SteamID,
1815 NameID = client.NameID,
1816 Name = client.Name,
1817 PreferredJob = client.Character?.Info?.Job != null && gameStarted
1818 ? client.Character.Info.Job.Prefab.Identifier
1819 : client.PreferredJob,
1820 PreferredTeam = client.PreferredTeam,
1821 CharacterID = client.Character == null || !gameStarted ? (ushort)0 : client.Character.ID,
1822 Karma = c.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.ServerLog) ? client.Karma : 100.0f,
1823 Muted = client.Muted,
1824 InGame = client.InGame,
1825 HasPermissions = client.Permissions != ClientPermissions.None,
1826 IsOwner = client.Connection == OwnerConnection,
1827 AllowKicking = client.Connection != OwnerConnection &&
1828 !client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.Ban) &&
1829 !client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.Kick) &&
1830 !client.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.Unban),
1831 IsDownloading = FileSender.ActiveTransfers.Any(t => t.Connection == client.Connection)
1832 };
1833
1834 var result = GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call<TempClient?>("writeClientList.modifyTempClientData", c, client, tempClientData, outmsg);
1835
1836 if (result != null)
1837 {
1838 tempClientData = result.Value;
1839 }
1840
1841 outmsg.Write(tempClientData);
1842 outmsg.WritePadBits();
1843 }
1844 }
1845
1846 public void ClientWriteLobby(Client c)
1847 {
1848 bool isInitialUpdate = false;
1849
1850 IWriteMessage outmsg = new WriteOnlyMessage();
1851 outmsg.Write((byte)ServerPacketHeader.UPDATE_LOBBY);
1852
1853 outmsg.Write((byte)ServerNetObject.SYNC_IDS);
1854
1855 int settingsBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes;
1856 int initialUpdateBytes = 0;
1857
1858 IWriteMessage settingsBuf = null;
1859 if (NetIdUtils.IdMoreRecent(GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.LastUpdateID, c.LastRecvLobbyUpdate))
1860 {
1861 outmsg.Write(true);
1862 outmsg.WritePadBits();
1863
1864 outmsg.Write(GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.LastUpdateID);
1865
1866 settingsBuf = new ReadWriteMessage();
1867 serverSettings.ServerWrite(settingsBuf, c);
1868 outmsg.Write((UInt16)settingsBuf.LengthBytes);
1869 outmsg.Write(settingsBuf.Buffer, 0, settingsBuf.LengthBytes);
1870
1871 outmsg.Write(c.LastRecvLobbyUpdate < 1);
1872 if (c.LastRecvLobbyUpdate < 1)
1873 {
1874 isInitialUpdate = true;
1875 initialUpdateBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes;
1876 ClientWriteInitial(c, outmsg);
1877 initialUpdateBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes - initialUpdateBytes;
1878 }
1879 outmsg.Write(GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedSub.Name);
1880 outmsg.Write(GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedSub.MD5Hash.ToString());
1881 outmsg.Write(IsUsingRespawnShuttle());
1882 var selectedShuttle = gameStarted && respawnManager != null && respawnManager.UsingShuttle ?
1883 respawnManager.RespawnShuttle.Info :
1884 GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedShuttle;
1885 outmsg.Write(selectedShuttle.Name);
1886 outmsg.Write(selectedShuttle.MD5Hash.ToString());
1887
1888 outmsg.Write(serverSettings.AllowSubVoting);
1889 outmsg.Write(serverSettings.AllowModeVoting);
1890
1891 outmsg.Write(serverSettings.VoiceChatEnabled);
1892
1893 outmsg.Write(serverSettings.AllowSpectating);
1894
1895 outmsg.WriteRangedInteger((int)serverSettings.TraitorsEnabled, 0, 2);
1896
1897 outmsg.WriteRangedInteger((int)GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.MissionType, 0, (int)MissionType.All);
1898
1899 outmsg.Write((byte)GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedModeIndex);
1900 outmsg.Write(GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.LevelSeed);
1901 outmsg.Write(serverSettings.SelectedLevelDifficulty);
1902
1903 outmsg.Write((byte)serverSettings.BotCount);
1904 outmsg.Write(serverSettings.BotSpawnMode == BotSpawnMode.Fill);
1905
1906 outmsg.Write(serverSettings.AutoRestart);
1907 if (serverSettings.AutoRestart)
1908 {
1909 outmsg.Write(autoRestartTimerRunning ? serverSettings.AutoRestartTimer : 0.0f);
1910 }
1911 }
1912 else
1913 {
1914 outmsg.Write(false);
1915 outmsg.WritePadBits();
1916 }
1917 settingsBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes - settingsBytes;
1918
1919 int campaignBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes;
1920 var campaign = GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode as MultiPlayerCampaign;
1921 if (outmsg.LengthBytes < MsgConstants.MTU - 500 &&
1922 campaign != null && campaign.Preset == GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedMode &&
1923 NetIdUtils.IdMoreRecent(campaign.LastUpdateID, c.LastRecvCampaignUpdate))
1924 {
1925 outmsg.Write(true);
1926 outmsg.WritePadBits();
1927 campaign.ServerWrite(outmsg, c);
1928 }
1929 else
1930 {
1931 outmsg.Write(false);
1932 outmsg.WritePadBits();
1933 }
1934 campaignBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes - campaignBytes;
1935
1936 outmsg.Write(c.LastSentChatMsgID); //send this to client so they know which chat messages weren't received by the server
1937
1938 int clientListBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes;
1939 if (outmsg.LengthBytes < MsgConstants.MTU - 500)
1940 {
1941 WriteClientList(c, outmsg);
1942 }
1943 clientListBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes - clientListBytes;
1944
1945 int chatMessageBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes;
1946 WriteChatMessages(outmsg, c);
1947 chatMessageBytes = outmsg.LengthBytes - chatMessageBytes;
1948
1949 outmsg.Write((byte)ServerNetObject.END_OF_MESSAGE);
1950
1951 bool messageTooLarge = outmsg.LengthBytes > MsgConstants.MTU;
1952 if (messageTooLarge && !isInitialUpdate)
1953 {
1954 string warningMsg = "Maximum packet size exceeded, will send using reliable mode (" + outmsg.LengthBytes + " > " + MsgConstants.MTU + ")\n";
1955 warningMsg +=
1956 " Client list size: " + clientListBytes + " bytes\n" +
1957 " Chat message size: " + chatMessageBytes + " bytes\n" +
1958 " Campaign size: " + campaignBytes + " bytes\n" +
1959 " Settings size: " + settingsBytes + " bytes\n";
1960 if (initialUpdateBytes > 0)
1961 {
1962 warningMsg +=
1963 " Initial update size: " + settingsBuf.LengthBytes + " bytes\n";
1964 }
1965 if (settingsBuf != null)
1966 {
1967 warningMsg +=
1968 " Settings buffer size: " + settingsBuf.LengthBytes + " bytes\n";
1969 }
1970#if DEBUG || UNSTABLE
1971 DebugConsole.ThrowError(warningMsg);
1972#else
1973 if (GameSettings.CurrentConfig.VerboseLogging) { DebugConsole.AddWarning(warningMsg); }
1974#endif
1975 GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("GameServer.ClientWriteIngame1:ClientWriteLobby" + outmsg.LengthBytes, GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Warning, warningMsg);
1976 }
1977
1978 if (isInitialUpdate || messageTooLarge)
1979 {
1980 //the initial update may be very large if the host has a large number
1981 //of submarine files, so the message may have to be fragmented
1982
1983 //unreliable messages don't play nicely with fragmenting, so we'll send the message reliably
1984 serverPeer.Send(outmsg, c.Connection, DeliveryMethod.Reliable);
1985
1986 //and assume the message was received, so we don't have to keep resending
1987 //these large initial messages until the client acknowledges receiving them
1988 c.LastRecvLobbyUpdate++;
1989
1990 }
1991 else
1992 {
1993 serverPeer.Send(outmsg, c.Connection, DeliveryMethod.Unreliable);
1994 }
1995
1996 if (isInitialUpdate)
1997 {
1998 SendVoteStatus(new List<Client>() { c });
1999 }
2000 }
2001
2002 private void WriteChatMessages(IWriteMessage outmsg, Client c)
2003 {
2004 c.ChatMsgQueue.RemoveAll(cMsg => !NetIdUtils.IdMoreRecent(cMsg.NetStateID, c.LastRecvChatMsgID));
2005 for (int i = 0; i < c.ChatMsgQueue.Count && i < ChatMessage.MaxMessagesPerPacket; i++)
2006 {
2007 if (outmsg.LengthBytes + c.ChatMsgQueue[i].EstimateLengthBytesServer(c) > MsgConstants.MTU - 5)
2008 {
2009 //not enough room in this packet
2010 return;
2011 }
2012 c.ChatMsgQueue[i].ServerWrite(outmsg, c);
2013 }
2014 }
2015
2016 public bool StartGame()
2017 {
2018 if (initiatedStartGame || gameStarted) { return false; }
2019
2020 Log("Starting a new round...", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
2021 SubmarineInfo selectedShuttle = GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedShuttle;
2022
2023 SubmarineInfo selectedSub;
2024 if (serverSettings.AllowSubVoting)
2025 {
2026 selectedSub = Voting.HighestVoted<SubmarineInfo>(VoteType.Sub, connectedClients);
2027 if (selectedSub == null) { selectedSub = GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedSub; }
2028 }
2029 else
2030 {
2031 selectedSub = GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedSub;
2032 }
2033
2034 if (selectedSub == null || selectedShuttle == null)
2035 {
2036 return false;
2037 }
2038
2039 GameModePreset selectedMode = Voting.HighestVoted<GameModePreset>(VoteType.Mode, connectedClients);
2040 if (selectedMode == null) { selectedMode = GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedMode; }
2041
2042 if (selectedMode == null)
2043 {
2044 return false;
2045 }
2046
2047 initiatedStartGame = true;
2048 startGameCoroutine = CoroutineManager.StartCoroutine(InitiateStartGame(selectedSub, selectedShuttle, selectedMode), "InitiateStartGame");
2049
2050 return true;
2051 }
2052
2053 private IEnumerable<CoroutineStatus> InitiateStartGame(SubmarineInfo selectedSub, SubmarineInfo selectedShuttle, GameModePreset selectedMode)
2054 {
2055 initiatedStartGame = true;
2056
2057 if (connectedClients.Any())
2058 {
2059 IWriteMessage msg = new WriteOnlyMessage();
2060 msg.Write((byte)ServerPacketHeader.QUERY_STARTGAME);
2061
2062 msg.Write(selectedSub.Name);
2063 msg.Write(selectedSub.MD5Hash.StringRepresentation);
2064
2065 msg.Write(IsUsingRespawnShuttle());
2066 msg.Write(selectedShuttle.Name);
2067 msg.Write(selectedShuttle.MD5Hash.StringRepresentation);
2068
2069 var campaign = GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode as MultiPlayerCampaign;
2070 msg.Write(campaign == null ? (byte)0 : campaign.CampaignID);
2071 msg.Write(campaign == null ? (UInt16)0 : campaign.LastSaveID);
2072 msg.Write(campaign == null ? (UInt16)0 : campaign.LastUpdateID);
2073
2074 connectedClients.ForEach(c => c.ReadyToStart = false);
2075
2076 foreach (NetworkConnection conn in connectedClients.Select(c => c.Connection))
2077 {
2078 serverPeer.Send(msg, conn, DeliveryMethod.Reliable);
2079 }
2080
2081 //give the clients a few seconds to request missing sub/shuttle files before starting the round
2082 float waitForResponseTimer = 5.0f;
2083 while (connectedClients.Any(c => !c.ReadyToStart) && waitForResponseTimer > 0.0f)
2084 {
2085 waitForResponseTimer -= CoroutineManager.UnscaledDeltaTime;
2086 yield return CoroutineStatus.Running;
2087 }
2088
2089 if (FileSender.ActiveTransfers.Count > 0)
2090 {
2091 float waitForTransfersTimer = 20.0f;
2092 while (FileSender.ActiveTransfers.Count > 0 && waitForTransfersTimer > 0.0f)
2093 {
2094 waitForTransfersTimer -= CoroutineManager.UnscaledDeltaTime;
2095 yield return CoroutineStatus.Running;
2096 }
2097 }
2098 }
2099
2100 startGameCoroutine = GameMain.Instance.ShowLoading(StartGame(selectedSub, selectedShuttle, selectedMode, CampaignSettings.Unsure), false);
2101
2102 yield return CoroutineStatus.Success;
2103 }

2105 private IEnumerable<CoroutineStatus> StartGame(SubmarineInfo selectedSub, SubmarineInfo selectedShuttle, GameModePreset selectedMode, CampaignSettings settings)
2106 {
2107 entityEventManager.Clear();
2108
2109 roundStartSeed = DateTime.Now.Millisecond;
2110 Rand.SetSyncedSeed(roundStartSeed);
2111
2112 int teamCount = 1;
2113 MultiPlayerCampaign campaign = selectedMode == GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode.Preset ?
2114 GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode as MultiPlayerCampaign : null;
2115
2116 if (campaign != null && campaign.Map == null)
2117 {
2118 initiatedStartGame = false;
2119 startGameCoroutine = null;
2120 string errorMsg = "Starting the round failed. Campaign was still active, but the map has been disposed. Try selecting another game mode.";
2121 DebugConsole.ThrowError(errorMsg);
2122 GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("GameServer.StartGame:InvalidCampaignState", GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error, errorMsg);
2123 if (OwnerConnection != null)
2124 {
2125 SendDirectChatMessage(errorMsg, connectedClients.Find(c => c.Connection == OwnerConnection), ChatMessageType.Error);
2126 }
2127 yield return CoroutineStatus.Failure;
2128 }
2129
2130 //don't instantiate a new gamesession if we're playing a campaign
2131 if (campaign == null || GameMain.GameSession == null)
2132 {
2133 GameMain.GameSession = new GameSession(selectedSub, "", selectedMode, settings, GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.LevelSeed, missionType: GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.MissionType);
2134 }

2137 if (serverSettings.AllowSpectating)
2138 {
2139 playingClients.RemoveAll(c => c.SpectateOnly);
2140 }
2141 //always allow the server owner to spectate even if it's disallowed in server settings
2142 playingClients.RemoveAll(c => c.Connection == OwnerConnection && c.SpectateOnly);
2143
2144 if (GameMain.GameSession.GameMode is PvPMode pvpMode)

2146 pvpMode.AssignTeamIDs(playingClients);
2147 teamCount = 2;
2148 }
2149 else
2150 {
2151 connectedClients.ForEach(c => c.TeamID = CharacterTeamType.Team1);
2152 }
2153
2154 if (campaign != null)
2155 {
2156 if (campaign.Map == null)
2157 {
2158 throw new Exception("Campaign map was null.");
2159 }
2160 if (campaign.NextLevel == null)
2161 {
2162 string errorMsg = "Failed to start a campaign round (next level not set).";
2163 DebugConsole.ThrowError(errorMsg);
2164 GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("GameServer.StartGame:InvalidCampaignState", GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error, errorMsg);
2165 if (OwnerConnection != null)
2166 {
2167 SendDirectChatMessage(errorMsg, connectedClients.Find(c => c.Connection == OwnerConnection), ChatMessageType.Error);
2168 }
2169 yield return CoroutineStatus.Failure;
2170 }
2171
2172 SendStartMessage(roundStartSeed, campaign.NextLevel.Seed, GameMain.GameSession, connectedClients, includesFinalize: false);
2173 GameMain.GameSession.StartRound(campaign.NextLevel, mirrorLevel: campaign.MirrorLevel);
2174 SubmarineSwitchLoad = false;
2175 campaign.AssignClientCharacterInfos(connectedClients);
2176 Log("Game mode: " + selectedMode.Name.Value, ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
2177 Log("Submarine: " + GameMain.GameSession.SubmarineInfo.Name, ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
2178 Log("Level seed: " + campaign.NextLevel.Seed, ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
2179 }

2183 GameMain.GameSession.StartRound(GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.LevelSeed, serverSettings.SelectedLevelDifficulty);
2184 Log("Game mode: " + selectedMode.Name.Value, ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
2185 Log("Submarine: " + selectedSub.Name, ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
2186 Log("Level seed: " + GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.LevelSeed, ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
2187 }
2188
2189 foreach (Mission mission in GameMain.GameSession.Missions)
2190 {
2191 Log("Mission: " + mission.Prefab.Name.Value, ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
2192 }
2193
2194 if (GameMain.GameSession.SubmarineInfo.IsFileCorrupted)
2195 {
2196 CoroutineManager.StopCoroutines(startGameCoroutine);
2197 initiatedStartGame = false;
2198 SendChatMessage(TextManager.FormatServerMessage($"SubLoadError~[subname]={GameMain.GameSession.SubmarineInfo.Name}"), ChatMessageType.Error);
2199 yield return CoroutineStatus.Failure;
2200 }
2201
2202 bool missionAllowRespawn = !(GameMain.GameSession.GameMode is MissionMode missionMode) || !missionMode.Missions.Any(m => !m.AllowRespawn);
2203 bool isOutpost = campaign != null && campaign.NextLevel?.Type == LevelData.LevelType.Outpost;
2204
2205 if (serverSettings.AllowRespawn && missionAllowRespawn)
2206 {
2207 respawnManager = new RespawnManager(this, serverSettings.UseRespawnShuttle && !isOutpost ? selectedShuttle : null);
2208 }
2209 if (campaign != null)
2210 {
2211 campaign.CargoManager.CreatePurchasedItems();
2212 campaign.SendCrewState(null, default, null);
2213 }

2217 Level.Loaded?.PrepareBeaconStation();
2218 AutoItemPlacer.PlaceIfNeeded();
2219
2220 CrewManager crewManager = campaign?.CrewManager;
2221
2222 bool hadBots = true;
2223
2224 //assign jobs and spawnpoints separately for each team
2225 for (int n = 0; n < teamCount; n++)
2226 {
2227 var teamID = n == 0 ? CharacterTeamType.Team1 : CharacterTeamType.Team2;
2228

2230 foreach (Item item in Item.ItemList)

2234 foreach (WifiComponent wifiComponent in item.GetComponents<WifiComponent>())
2235 {
2236 wifiComponent.TeamID = Submarine.MainSubs[n].TeamID;
2237 }
2238 }
2239 foreach (Submarine sub in Submarine.MainSubs[n].DockedTo)
2240 {

2242 sub.TeamID = teamID;
2243 }
2244

2246 List<Client> teamClients = teamCount == 1 ? new List<Client>(playingClients) : playingClients.FindAll(c => c.TeamID == teamID);
2247 if (serverSettings.AllowSpectating)
2248 {
2249 teamClients.RemoveAll(c => c.SpectateOnly);
2250 }
2251 //always allow the server owner to spectate even if it's disallowed in server settings
2252 teamClients.RemoveAll(c => c.Connection == OwnerConnection && c.SpectateOnly);
2253
2254 //if (!teamClients.Any() && n > 0) { continue; }

2257

2259
2260 List<CharacterInfo> characterInfos = new List<CharacterInfo>();

2274 }

2278 client.CharacterInfo.Job = new Job(client.AssignedJob.Prefab, Rand.RandSync.Unsynced, client.AssignedJob.Variant);
2279 }
2280 }
2281

2283
2284 // do not load new bots if we already have them
2285 if (crewManager == null || !crewManager.HasBots)
2286 {

2288 for (int i = 0; i < botsToSpawn; i++)

2299 if (campaign != null)
2300 {
2301 foreach (CharacterInfo bot in bots)

2304 }

2310 hadBots = false;

2312 }
2313
2314 List<WayPoint> spawnWaypoints = null;
2315 List<WayPoint> mainSubWaypoints = WayPoint.SelectCrewSpawnPoints(characterInfos, Submarine.MainSubs[n]).ToList();
2316 if (Level.Loaded?.StartOutpost != null &&
2317 Level.Loaded.Type == LevelData.LevelType.Outpost &&
2318 (Level.Loaded.StartOutpost.Info.OutpostGenerationParams?.SpawnCrewInsideOutpost ?? false) &&
2319 Level.Loaded.StartOutpost.GetConnectedSubs().Any(s => s.Info.Type == SubmarineType.Player))
2320 {
2321 spawnWaypoints = WayPoint.WayPointList.FindAll(wp =>
2322 wp.SpawnType == SpawnType.Human &&
2323 wp.Submarine == Level.Loaded.StartOutpost &&
2324 wp.CurrentHull?.OutpostModuleTags != null &&
2325 wp.CurrentHull.OutpostModuleTags.Contains("airlock".ToIdentifier()));
2326 while (spawnWaypoints.Count > characterInfos.Count)
2327 {
2328 spawnWaypoints.RemoveAt(Rand.Int(spawnWaypoints.Count));
2329 }
2330 while (spawnWaypoints.Any() && spawnWaypoints.Count < characterInfos.Count)
2331 {
2332 spawnWaypoints.Add(spawnWaypoints[Rand.Int(spawnWaypoints.Count)]);
2333 }
2334 }
2335 if (spawnWaypoints == null || !spawnWaypoints.Any())
2336 {
2337 spawnWaypoints = mainSubWaypoints;
2338 }
2339 Debug.Assert(spawnWaypoints.Count == mainSubWaypoints.Count);
2340
2341 for (int i = 0; i < teamClients.Count; i++)
2342 {
2343 Character spawnedCharacter = Character.Create(teamClients[i].CharacterInfo, spawnWaypoints[i].WorldPosition, teamClients[i].CharacterInfo.Name, isRemotePlayer: true, hasAi: false);
2344 spawnedCharacter.AnimController.Frozen = true;

2347 var characterData = campaign?.GetClientCharacterData(teamClients[i]);

2354 characterData.HasSpawned = true;
2355 }
2356 }
2357 else
2358 {
2359 if (!characterData.HasItemData && !characterData.CharacterInfo.StartItemsGiven)
2360 {
2361 //clients who've chosen to spawn with the respawn penalty can have CharacterData without inventory data
2362 spawnedCharacter.GiveJobItems(mainSubWaypoints[i]);
2363 }
2364 else
2365 {
2366 characterData.SpawnInventoryItems(spawnedCharacter, spawnedCharacter.Inventory);
2367 }
2368 characterData.ApplyHealthData(spawnedCharacter);
2369 characterData.ApplyOrderData(spawnedCharacter);
2370 characterData.ApplyWalletData(spawnedCharacter);
2371 spawnedCharacter.GiveIdCardTags(mainSubWaypoints[i]);
2372 spawnedCharacter.LoadTalents();
2373
2374 characterData.HasSpawned = true;
2375 }
2376 if (GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode is MultiPlayerCampaign mpCampaign && spawnedCharacter.Info != null)
2377 {
2378 spawnedCharacter.Info.SetExperience(Math.Max(spawnedCharacter.Info.ExperiencePoints, mpCampaign.GetSavedExperiencePoints(teamClients[i])));
2379 mpCampaign.ClearSavedExperiencePoints(teamClients[i]);
2380 }

2382 spawnedCharacter.OwnerClientEndPoint = teamClients[i].Connection.EndPointString;
2383 spawnedCharacter.OwnerClientName = teamClients[i].Name;
2384 }
2385

2387 {
2388 Character spawnedCharacter = Character.Create(characterInfos[i], spawnWaypoints[i].WorldPosition, characterInfos[i].Name, isRemotePlayer: false, hasAi: true);
2389 spawnedCharacter.TeamID = teamID;
2390 spawnedCharacter.GiveJobItems(mainSubWaypoints[i]);
2391 spawnedCharacter.GiveIdCardTags(mainSubWaypoints[i]);
2392 spawnedCharacter.Info.InventoryData = new XElement("inventory");
2393 spawnedCharacter.Info.StartItemsGiven = true;
2394 spawnedCharacter.SaveInventory();
2395 // talents are only avilable for players in online sessions, but modders or someone else might want to have them loaded anyway
2396 spawnedCharacter.LoadTalents();
2397 }
2398 }
2399
2400 if (crewManager != null && crewManager.HasBots)
2401 {
2402 if (hadBots)
2403 {
2404 //loaded existing bots -> init them
2405 crewManager.InitRound();
2406 }
2407 else
2408 {

2410 SaveUtil.SaveGame(GameMain.GameSession.SavePath);
2411 }

2413
2414 campaign?.LoadPets();
