2416
2417 foreach (Submarine sub in Submarine.MainSubs)
2418 {
2419 if (sub == null) { continue; }
2420
2421 List<PurchasedItem> spawnList = new List<PurchasedItem>();
2422 foreach (KeyValuePair<ItemPrefab, int> kvp in serverSettings.ExtraCargo)
2423 {
2424 spawnList.Add(new PurchasedItem(kvp.Key, kvp.Value, buyer: null));
2425 }
2426
2427 CargoManager.CreateItems(spawnList, sub);
2428 }
2429
2430 TraitorManager = null;
2431 if (serverSettings.TraitorsEnabled == YesNoMaybe.Yes ||
2432 (serverSettings.TraitorsEnabled == YesNoMaybe.Maybe && Rand.Range(0.0f, 1.0f) < 0.5f))
2433 {
2434 if (!(GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode is CampaignMode))
2435 {
2436 if (!GameMain.LuaCs.Game.overrideTraitors)
2437 {
2438 TraitorManager = new TraitorManager();
2439 TraitorManager.Start(this);
2440 }
2441 }
2442 }
2443
2444 GameAnalyticsManager.AddDesignEvent("Traitors:" + (TraitorManager == null ? "Disabled" : "Enabled"));
2445
2446 yield return CoroutineStatus.Running;
2447
2448 Voting?.ResetVotes(GameMain.Server.ConnectedClients);
2449
2450 GameMain.GameScreen.Select();
2451
2452 Log("Round started.", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
2453
2454 gameStarted = true;
2455 initiatedStartGame = false;
2456 GameMain.ResetFrameTime();
2457
2458 LastClientListUpdateID++;
2459
2460 roundStartTime = DateTime.Now;
2461
2462 GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call("roundStart");
2463
2464 startGameCoroutine = null;
2465 yield return CoroutineStatus.Success;
2466 }
2467
2468 private void SendStartMessage(int seed, string levelSeed, GameSession gameSession, List<Client> clients, bool includesFinalize)
2469 {
2470 foreach (Client client in clients)
2471 {
2472 SendStartMessage(seed, levelSeed, gameSession, client, includesFinalize);
2473 }
2474 }
2475
2476 private void SendStartMessage(int seed, string levelSeed, GameSession gameSession, Client client, bool includesFinalize)
2477 {
2478 MultiPlayerCampaign campaign = GameMain.GameSession?.GameMode as MultiPlayerCampaign;
2479 MissionMode missionMode = GameMain.GameSession.GameMode as MissionMode;
2480
2481 IWriteMessage msg = new WriteOnlyMessage();
2482 msg.Write((byte)ServerPacketHeader.STARTGAME);
2483 msg.Write(seed);
2484 msg.Write(gameSession.GameMode.Preset.Identifier);
2485 bool missionAllowRespawn = missionMode == null || !missionMode.Missions.Any(m => !m.AllowRespawn);
2486 msg.Write(serverSettings.AllowRespawn && missionAllowRespawn);
2487 msg.Write(serverSettings.AllowDisguises);
2488 msg.Write(serverSettings.AllowRewiring);
2489 msg.Write(serverSettings.AllowFriendlyFire);
2490 msg.Write(serverSettings.LockAllDefaultWires);
2491 msg.Write(serverSettings.AllowRagdollButton);
2492 msg.Write(serverSettings.AllowLinkingWifiToChat);
2493 msg.Write(IsUsingRespawnShuttle());
2494 msg.Write((byte)serverSettings.LosMode);
2495 msg.Write(includesFinalize); msg.WritePadBits();
2496
2497 serverSettings.WriteMonsterEnabled(msg);
2498
2499 if (campaign == null)
2500 {
2501 msg.Write(levelSeed);
2502 msg.Write(serverSettings.SelectedLevelDifficulty);
2503 msg.Write(gameSession.SubmarineInfo.Name);
2504 msg.Write(gameSession.SubmarineInfo.MD5Hash.StringRepresentation);
2505 var selectedShuttle = gameStarted && respawnManager != null && respawnManager.UsingShuttle ?
2506 respawnManager.RespawnShuttle.Info : GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedShuttle;
2507 msg.Write(selectedShuttle.Name);
2508 msg.Write(selectedShuttle.MD5Hash.StringRepresentation);
2509 msg.Write((byte)GameMain.GameSession.GameMode.Missions.Count());
2510 foreach (Mission mission in GameMain.GameSession.GameMode.Missions)
2511 {
2512 msg.Write(mission.Prefab.UintIdentifier);
2513 }
2514 }
2515 else
2516 {
2517 int nextLocationIndex = campaign.Map.Locations.FindIndex(l => l.LevelData == campaign.NextLevel);
2518 int nextConnectionIndex = campaign.Map.Connections.FindIndex(c => c.LevelData == campaign.NextLevel);
2519 msg.Write(campaign.CampaignID);
2520 msg.Write(campaign.LastSaveID);
2521 msg.Write(nextLocationIndex);
2522 msg.Write(nextConnectionIndex);
2523 msg.Write(campaign.Map.SelectedLocationIndex);
2524 msg.Write(campaign.MirrorLevel);
2525 }
2526
2527 if (includesFinalize)
2528 {
2529 WriteRoundStartFinalize(msg, client);
2530 }
2531
2532 serverPeer.Send(msg, client.Connection, DeliveryMethod.Reliable);
2533 }
2534
2535 private bool IsUsingRespawnShuttle()
2536 {
2537 return serverSettings.UseRespawnShuttle || (gameStarted && respawnManager != null && respawnManager.UsingShuttle);
2538 }
2539
2540 private void SendRoundStartFinalize(Client client)
2541 {
2542 IWriteMessage msg = new WriteOnlyMessage();
2543 msg.Write((byte)ServerPacketHeader.STARTGAMEFINALIZE);
2544 WriteRoundStartFinalize(msg, client);
2545 serverPeer.Send(msg, client.Connection, DeliveryMethod.Reliable);
2546 }
2547
2548 private void WriteRoundStartFinalize(IWriteMessage msg, Client client)
2549 {
2550 //tell the client what content files they should preload
2551 var contentToPreload = GameMain.GameSession.EventManager.GetFilesToPreload();
2552 msg.Write((ushort)contentToPreload.Count());
2553 foreach (ContentFile contentFile in contentToPreload)
2554 {
2555 msg.Write(contentFile.Path.Value);
2556 }
2557 msg.Write(Submarine.MainSub?.Info.EqualityCheckVal ?? 0);
2558 msg.Write((byte)GameMain.GameSession.Missions.Count());
2559 foreach (Mission mission in GameMain.GameSession.Missions)
2560 {
2561 msg.Write(mission.Prefab.Identifier);
2562 }
2563 msg.Write((byte)GameMain.GameSession.Level.EqualityCheckValues.Count);
2564 foreach (int equalityCheckValue in GameMain.GameSession.Level.EqualityCheckValues)
2565 {
2566 msg.Write(equalityCheckValue);
2567 }
2568 foreach (Mission mission in GameMain.GameSession.Missions)
2569 {
2570 mission.ServerWriteInitial(msg, client);
2571 }
2572 msg.Write(GameMain.GameSession.CrewManager != null);
2573 GameMain.GameSession.CrewManager?.ServerWriteActiveOrders(msg);
2574 }
2575
2576 public void EndGame(CampaignMode.TransitionType transitionType = CampaignMode.TransitionType.None, bool wasSaved = false)
2577 {
2578 if (!gameStarted)
2579 {
2580 return;
2581 }
2582
2583 if (GameSettings.CurrentConfig.VerboseLogging)
2584 {
2585 Log("Ending the round...\n" + Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace(), ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
2586
2587 }
2588 else
2589 {
2590 Log("Ending the round...", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
2591 }
2592
2593 string endMessage = TextManager.FormatServerMessage("RoundSummaryRoundHasEnded");
2594 var traitorResults = TraitorManager?.GetEndResults() ?? new List<TraitorMissionResult>();
2595
2596 List<TraitorMissionResult> customTraitorResults = GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call<List<TraitorMissionResult>>("roundEnd");
2597 if (customTraitorResults != null)
2598 {
2599 traitorResults = customTraitorResults;
2600 }
2601
2602 List<Mission> missions = GameMain.GameSession.Missions.ToList();
2603 if (GameMain.GameSession.IsRunning)
2604 {
2605 GameMain.GameSession.EndRound(endMessage, traitorResults);
2606 }
2607
2608 endRoundTimer = 0.0f;
2609
2610 if (serverSettings.AutoRestart)
2611 {
2612 serverSettings.AutoRestartTimer = serverSettings.AutoRestartInterval;
2613 //send a netlobby update to get the clients' autorestart timers up to date
2614 GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.LastUpdateID++;
2615 }
2616
2617 if (serverSettings.SaveServerLogs) { serverSettings.ServerLog.Save(); }
2618
2619 GameMain.GameScreen.Cam.TargetPos = Vector2.Zero;
2620
2621 entityEventManager.Clear();
2622 foreach (Client c in connectedClients)
2623 {
2624 c.EntityEventLastSent.Clear();
2625 c.PendingPositionUpdates.Clear();
2626 c.PositionUpdateLastSent.Clear();
2627 }
2628
2629 KarmaManager.OnRoundEnded();
2630
2631#if DEBUG
2632 messageCount.Clear();
2633#endif
2634
2635 respawnManager = null;
2636 gameStarted = false;
2637
2638 if (connectedClients.Count > 0)
2639 {
2640 IWriteMessage msg = new WriteOnlyMessage();
2641 msg.Write((byte)ServerPacketHeader.ENDGAME);
2642 msg.Write((byte)transitionType);
2643 msg.Write(wasSaved);
2644 msg.Write(endMessage);
2645 msg.Write((byte)missions.Count);
2646 foreach (Mission mission in missions)
2647 {
2648 msg.Write(mission.Completed);
2649 }
2650 msg.Write(GameMain.GameSession?.WinningTeam == null ? (byte)0 : (byte)GameMain.GameSession.WinningTeam);
2651
2652 msg.Write((byte)traitorResults.Count);
2653 foreach (var traitorResult in traitorResults)
2654 {
2655 traitorResult.ServerWrite(msg);
2656 }
2657
2658 foreach (Client client in connectedClients)
2659 {
2660 serverPeer.Send(msg, client.Connection, DeliveryMethod.Reliable);
2661 client.Character?.Info?.ClearCurrentOrders();
2662 client.Character = null;
2663 client.HasSpawned = false;
2664 client.InGame = false;
2665 client.WaitForNextRoundRespawn = null;
2666 }
2667 }

2670 Submarine.Unload();
2671 GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.Select();
2672 Log("Round ended.", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
2673
2674 GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.RandomizeSettings();
2675 }

2694 private bool TryChangeClientName(Client c, IReadMessage inc)
2695 {
2696 UInt16 nameId = inc.ReadUInt16();
2697 string newName = inc.ReadString();
2698 Identifier newJob = inc.ReadIdentifier();
2699 CharacterTeamType newTeam = (CharacterTeamType)inc.ReadByte();
2700
2701 if (c == null || string.IsNullOrEmpty(newName) || !NetIdUtils.IdMoreRecent(nameId, c.NameID)) { return false; }
2702
2703 c.NameID = nameId;
2704 newName = Client.SanitizeName(newName);
2705 if (newName == c.Name && newJob == c.PreferredJob && newTeam == c.PreferredTeam) { return false; }
2706
2707 var result = GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call<bool?>("tryChangeClientName", c, newName, newJob, newTeam);
2708
2709 if (result != null)
2710 {
2711 LastClientListUpdateID++;
2712 return result.Value;
2713 }
2714
2715 c.PreferredJob = newJob;
2716 c.PreferredTeam = newTeam;
2717
2718 //update client list even if the name cannot be changed to the one sent by the client,
2719 //so the client will be informed what their actual name is
2720 LastClientListUpdateID++;
2721
2722 if (newName == c.Name) { return false; }
2723
2724 if (c.Connection != OwnerConnection)
2725 {
2726 if (!Client.IsValidName(newName, serverSettings))
2727 {
2728 SendDirectChatMessage($"ServerMessage.NameChangeFailedSymbols~[newname]={newName}", c, ChatMessageType.ServerMessageBox);
2729 return false;
2730 }
2731 if (Homoglyphs.Compare(newName.ToLower(), ServerName.ToLower()))
2732 {
2733 SendDirectChatMessage($"ServerMessage.NameChangeFailedServerTooSimilar~[newname]={newName}", c, ChatMessageType.ServerMessageBox);
2734 return false;
2735 }
2736
2737 if (c.KickVoteCount > 0)
2738 {
2739 SendDirectChatMessage($"ServerMessage.NameChangeFailedVoteKick~[newname]={newName}", c, ChatMessageType.ServerMessageBox);
2740 return false;
2741 }
2742 }
2743
2744 Client nameTaken = ConnectedClients.Find(c2 => c != c2 && Homoglyphs.Compare(c2.Name.ToLower(), newName.ToLower()));
2745 if (nameTaken != null)
2746 {
2747 SendDirectChatMessage($"ServerMessage.NameChangeFailedClientTooSimilar~[newname]={newName}~[takenname]={nameTaken.Name}", c, ChatMessageType.ServerMessageBox);
2748 return false;
2749 }
2750
2751 SendChatMessage($"ServerMessage.NameChangeSuccessful~[oldname]={c.Name}~[newname]={newName}", ChatMessageType.Server);
2752 c.Name = newName;
2753 c.Connection.Name = newName;
2754 return true;
2755 }

2808 public void BanClient(Client client, string reason, bool range = false, TimeSpan? duration = null)
2809 {
2810 if (client == null || client.Connection == OwnerConnection) { return; }
2811
2812 var previousPlayer = previousPlayers.Find(p => p.MatchesClient(client));
2813 if (previousPlayer != null)
2814 {
2815 //reset karma to a neutral value, so if/when the ban is revoked the client wont get immediately punished by low karma again
2816 previousPlayer.Karma = Math.Max(previousPlayer.Karma, 50.0f);
2817 }
2818 client.Karma = Math.Max(client.Karma, 50.0f);
2819
2820 string targetMsg = DisconnectReason.Banned.ToString();
2821 DisconnectClient(client, $"ServerMessage.BannedFromServer~[client]={client.Name}", targetMsg, reason, PlayerConnectionChangeType.Banned);
2822
2823 if (client.Connection is LidgrenConnection lidgrenConn && (client.SteamID == 0 || range))
2824 {
2825 string ip = "";
2826 ip = lidgrenConn.IPEndPoint.Address.IsIPv4MappedToIPv6 ?
2827 lidgrenConn.IPEndPoint.Address.MapToIPv4NoThrow().ToString() :
2828 lidgrenConn.IPEndPoint.Address.ToString();
2829 if (range) { ip = BanList.ToRange(ip); }
2830 serverSettings.BanList.BanPlayer(client.Name, ip, reason, duration);
2831 }
2832 if (client.SteamID > 0)
2833 {
2834 serverSettings.BanList.BanPlayer(client.Name, client.SteamID, reason, duration);
2835 }
2836 if (client.OwnerSteamID > 0)
2837 {
2838 serverSettings.BanList.BanPlayer(client.Name, client.OwnerSteamID, reason, duration);
2839 }
2840 }

2842 public void BanPreviousPlayer(PreviousPlayer previousPlayer, string reason, bool range = false, TimeSpan? duration = null)
2843 {
2844 if (previousPlayer == null) { return; }
2845
2846 //reset karma to a neutral value, so if/when the ban is revoked the client wont get immediately punished by low karma again
2847 previousPlayer.Karma = Math.Max(previousPlayer.Karma, 50.0f);
2848
2849 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(previousPlayer.EndPoint) && (previousPlayer.SteamID == 0 || range))
2850 {
2851 string ip = previousPlayer.EndPoint;
2852 if (range) { ip = BanList.ToRange(ip); }
2853 serverSettings.BanList.BanPlayer(previousPlayer.Name, ip, reason, duration);
2854 }
2855 if (previousPlayer.SteamID > 0)
2856 {
2857 serverSettings.BanList.BanPlayer(previousPlayer.Name, previousPlayer.SteamID, reason, duration);
2858 }
2859 if (previousPlayer.OwnerSteamID > 0)
2860 {
2861 serverSettings.BanList.BanPlayer(previousPlayer.Name, previousPlayer.OwnerSteamID, reason, duration);
2862 }
2863
2864 string msg = $"ServerMessage.BannedFromServer~[client]={previousPlayer.Name}";
2865 if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(reason))
2866 {
2867 msg += $"/ /ServerMessage.Reason/: /{reason}";
2868 }
2869 SendChatMessage(msg, ChatMessageType.Server, changeType: PlayerConnectionChangeType.Banned);
2870 }

2898 public void DisconnectClient(Client client, string msg = "", string targetmsg = "", string reason = "", PlayerConnectionChangeType changeType = PlayerConnectionChangeType.Disconnected)
2899 {
2900 if (client == null) return;
2901
2902 GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call("clientDisconnected", client);
2903
2904 if (gameStarted && client.Character != null)
2905 {
2906 client.Character.ClientDisconnected = true;
2907 client.Character.ClearInputs();
2908 }
2909
2910 client.Character = null;
2911 client.HasSpawned = false;
2912 client.WaitForNextRoundRespawn = null;
2913 client.InGame = false;
2914
2915 if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(msg)) { msg = $"ServerMessage.ClientLeftServer~[client]={ClientLogName(client)}"; }
2916 if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(targetmsg)) { targetmsg = "ServerMessage.YouLeftServer"; }
2917 if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(reason))
2918 {
2919 msg += $"/ /ServerMessage.Reason/: /{reason}";
2920 targetmsg += $"/\n/ServerMessage.Reason/: /{reason}";
2921 }
2922
2923 if (client.SteamID != 0) { SteamManager.StopAuthSession(client.SteamID); }
2924
2925 var previousPlayer = previousPlayers.Find(p => p.MatchesClient(client));
2926 if (previousPlayer == null)
2927 {
2928 previousPlayer = new PreviousPlayer(client);
2929 previousPlayers.Add(previousPlayer);
2930 }
2931 previousPlayer.Name = client.Name;
2932 previousPlayer.Karma = client.Karma;
2933 previousPlayer.KarmaKickCount = client.KarmaKickCount;
2934 previousPlayer.KickVoters.Clear();
2935 foreach (Client c in connectedClients)
2936 {
2937 if (client.HasKickVoteFrom(c)) { previousPlayer.KickVoters.Add(c); }
2938 }
2939
2940 serverPeer.Disconnect(client.Connection, targetmsg);
2941 client.Dispose();
2942 connectedClients.Remove(client);
2943
2944 KarmaManager.OnClientDisconnected(client);
2945
2946 UpdateVoteStatus();
2947
2948 SendChatMessage(msg, ChatMessageType.Server, changeType: changeType);
2949
2950 UpdateCrewFrame();
2951
2952 serverSettings.ServerDetailsChanged = true;
2953 refreshMasterTimer = DateTime.Now;
2954 }

2987 (ushort)(recipient.ChatMsgQueue.Last().NetStateID + 1) :

2990 recipient.ChatMsgQueue.Add(msg);

2993
2997 public void SendChatMessage(string message, ChatMessageType? type = null, Client senderClient = null, Character senderCharacter = null, PlayerConnectionChangeType changeType = PlayerConnectionChangeType.None)
2998 {
2999 string senderName = "";
3000
3001 Client targetClient = null;
3002
3003 if (type == null)
3004 {
3005 string command = ChatMessage.GetChatMessageCommand(message, out string tempStr);
3006 switch (command.ToLowerInvariant())
3007 {
3008 case "r":
3009 case "radio":
3010 type = ChatMessageType.Radio;
3011 break;
3012 case "d":
3013 case "dead":
3014 type = ChatMessageType.Dead;
3015 break;
3016 default:
3017 if (command != "")
3018 {
3019 if (command.ToLower() == serverName.ToLower())
3020 {
3021 //a private message to the host
3022 if (OwnerConnection != null)
3023 {
3024 targetClient = connectedClients.Find(c => c.Connection == OwnerConnection);
3025 }
3026 }
3027 else
3028 {
3029 targetClient = connectedClients.Find(c =>
3030 command.ToLower() == c.Name.ToLower() ||
3031 command.ToLower() == c.Character?.Name?.ToLower());
3032
3033 if (targetClient == null)
3034 {
3035 if (senderClient != null)
3036 {
3037 var chatMsg = ChatMessage.Create(
3038 "", $"ServerMessage.PlayerNotFound~[player]={command}",
3039 ChatMessageType.Error, null);
3040 SendDirectChatMessage(chatMsg, senderClient);
3041 }
3042 else
3043 {
3044 AddChatMessage($"ServerMessage.PlayerNotFound~[player]={command}", ChatMessageType.Error);
3045 }
3046
3047 return;
3048 }
3049 }
3050
3051 type = ChatMessageType.Private;
3052 }
3053 else
3054 {
3055 type = ChatMessageType.Default;
3056 }
3057 break;
3058 }
3059
3060 message = tempStr;
3061 }
3062
3063 if (gameStarted)
3064 {
3065 if (senderClient == null)
3066 {
3067 //msg sent by the server
3068 if (senderCharacter == null)
3069 {
3070 senderName = serverName;
3071 }
3072 else //msg sent by an AI character
3073 {
3074 senderName = senderCharacter.Name;
3075 }
3076 }
3077 else //msg sent by a client
3078 {
3079 senderCharacter = senderClient.Character;
3080 senderName = senderCharacter == null ? senderClient.Name : senderCharacter.Name;
3081
3082 if (type == ChatMessageType.Private)
3083 {
3084 if (senderCharacter != null && !senderCharacter.IsDead || targetClient.Character != null && !targetClient.Character.IsDead)
3085 {
3086 //sender or target has an alive character, sending private messages not allowed
3087 SendDirectChatMessage(ChatMessage.Create("", $"ServerMessage.PrivateMessagesNotAllowed", ChatMessageType.Error, null), senderClient);
3088 return;
3089 }
3090 }
3091 //sender doesn't have a character or the character can't speak -> only ChatMessageType.Dead allowed
3092 else if (senderCharacter == null || senderCharacter.IsDead || senderCharacter.SpeechImpediment >= 100.0f)
3093 {
3094 type = ChatMessageType.Dead;
3095 }
3096 }
3097 }
3098 else
3099 {
3100 if (senderClient == null)
3101 {
3102 //msg sent by the server
3103 if (senderCharacter == null)
3104 {
3105 senderName = serverName;
3106 }
3107 else //sent by an AI character, not allowed when the game is not running
3108 {
3109 return;
3110 }
3111 }
3112 else //msg sent by a client
3113 {
3114 //game not started -> clients can only send normal and private chatmessages
3115 if (type != ChatMessageType.Private) type = ChatMessageType.Default;
3116 senderName = senderClient.Name;
3117 }
3118 }
3119
3120 //check if the client is allowed to send the message
3121 WifiComponent senderRadio = null;
3122 switch (type)
3123 {
3124 case ChatMessageType.Radio:
3125 case ChatMessageType.Order:
3126 if (senderCharacter == null) { return; }
3127 if (!ChatMessage.CanUseRadio(senderCharacter, out senderRadio)) { return; }
3128 break;
3129 case ChatMessageType.Dead:
3130 //character still alive and capable of speaking -> dead chat not allowed
3131 if (senderClient != null && senderCharacter != null && !senderCharacter.IsDead && senderCharacter.SpeechImpediment < 100.0f)
3132 {
3133 return;
3134 }
3135 break;
3136 }
3137
3138 if (type == ChatMessageType.Server || type == ChatMessageType.Error)
3139 {
3140 senderName = null;
3141 senderCharacter = null;
3142 }
3143 else if (type == ChatMessageType.Radio && !GameMain.LuaCs.Game.overrideSignalRadio)
3144 {
3145 //send to chat-linked wifi components
3146 Signal s = new Signal(message, sender: senderCharacter, source: senderRadio.Item);
3147 senderRadio.TransmitSignal(s, sentFromChat: true);
3148 }
3149
3150 var hookChatMsg = ChatMessage.Create(senderName, message, (ChatMessageType)type, senderCharacter, senderClient, changeType);
3151
3152 var should = GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call<bool?>("modifyChatMessage", hookChatMsg, senderRadio);
3153
3154 if (should != null && should.Value)
3155 return;
3156
3157
3158 //check which clients can receive the message and apply distance effects
3159 foreach (Client client in ConnectedClients)
3160 {
3161 string modifiedMessage = message;
3162
3163 switch (type)
3164 {
3165 case ChatMessageType.Default:
3166 case ChatMessageType.Radio:
3167 case ChatMessageType.Order:
3168 if (senderCharacter != null &&
3169 client.Character != null && !client.Character.IsDead)
3170 {
3171 if (senderCharacter != client.Character)
3172 {
3173 modifiedMessage = ChatMessage.ApplyDistanceEffect(message, (ChatMessageType)type, senderCharacter, client.Character);
3174 }
3175
3176 //too far to hear the msg -> don't send
3177 if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(modifiedMessage)) continue;
3178 }
3179 break;
3180 case ChatMessageType.Dead:
3181 //character still alive -> don't send
3182 if (client != senderClient && client.Character != null && !client.Character.IsDead) continue;
3183 break;
3184 case ChatMessageType.Private:
3185 //private msg sent to someone else than this client -> don't send
3186 if (client != targetClient && client != senderClient) continue;
3187 break;
3188 }
3189
3190
3191 var chatMsg = ChatMessage.Create(
3192 senderName,
3193 modifiedMessage,
3194 (ChatMessageType)type,
3195 senderCharacter,
3196 senderClient,
3197 changeType);
3198
3199 SendDirectChatMessage(chatMsg, client);
3200 }
3201
3202 if (type.Value != ChatMessageType.MessageBox)
3203 {
3204 string myReceivedMessage = type == ChatMessageType.Server || type == ChatMessageType.Error ? TextManager.GetServerMessage(message).Value : message;
3205 if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(myReceivedMessage))
3206 {
3207 AddChatMessage(myReceivedMessage, (ChatMessageType)type, senderName, senderClient, senderCharacter);
3208 }
3209 }
3210 }

3212 public void SendOrderChatMessage(OrderChatMessage message)
3213 {
3214 if (message.Sender == null || message.Sender.SpeechImpediment >= 100.0f) { return; }
3215 //check which clients can receive the message and apply distance effects
3216 foreach (Client client in ConnectedClients)
3217 {
3218 if (message.Sender != null && client.Character != null && !client.Character.IsDead)
3219 {
3220 //too far to hear the msg -> don't send
3221 if (!client.Character.CanHearCharacter(message.Sender)) { continue; }
3222 }
3223 SendDirectChatMessage(new OrderChatMessage(message.Order, message.TargetCharacter, message.Sender, isNewOrder: message.IsNewOrder), client);
3224 }
3225 if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(message.Text))
3226 {
3227 AddChatMessage(new OrderChatMessage(message.Order, message.TargetCharacter, message.Sender, isNewOrder: message.IsNewOrder));
3228 }

3251 public void UpdateVoteStatus(bool checkActiveVote = true)
3252 {
3253 if (connectedClients.Count == 0) { return; }
3254
3255 if (checkActiveVote && Voting.ActiveVote != null)
3256 {
3257 int yes = GameMain.Server.ConnectedClients.Count(c => c.InGame && c.GetVote<int>(Voting.ActiveVote.VoteType) == 2);
3258 int no = GameMain.Server.ConnectedClients.Count(c => c.InGame && c.GetVote<int>(Voting.ActiveVote.VoteType) == 1);
3259 int max = GameMain.Server.ConnectedClients.Count(c => c.InGame);
3260 // Required ratio cannot be met
3261 if (no / (float)max > 1f - serverSettings.VoteRequiredRatio)
3262 {
3263 Voting.ActiveVote.Finish(Voting, passed: false);
3264 }
3265 else if (yes / (float)max >= serverSettings.VoteRequiredRatio)
3266 {
3267 Voting.ActiveVote.Finish(Voting, passed: true);
3268 }
3269 }
3270
3271 Client.UpdateKickVotes(connectedClients);
3272
3273 int minimumKickVotes = Math.Max(1, (int)(connectedClients.Count * serverSettings.KickVoteRequiredRatio));
3274 var clientsToKick = connectedClients.FindAll(c =>
3275 c.Connection != OwnerConnection &&
3276 !c.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.Kick) &&
3277 !c.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.Ban) &&
3278 !c.HasPermission(ClientPermissions.Unban) &&
3279 c.KickVoteCount >= minimumKickVotes);
3280 foreach (Client c in clientsToKick)
3281 {
3282 var previousPlayer = previousPlayers.Find(p => p.MatchesClient(c));
3283 if (previousPlayer != null)
3284 {
3285 //reset the client's kick votes (they can rejoin after their ban expires)
3286 previousPlayer.KickVoters.Clear();
3287 }
3288
3289 SendChatMessage($"ServerMessage.KickedFromServer~[client]={c.Name}", ChatMessageType.Server, null, changeType: PlayerConnectionChangeType.Kicked);
3290 KickClient(c, "ServerMessage.KickedByVote");
3291 BanClient(c, "ServerMessage.KickedByVoteAutoBan", duration: TimeSpan.FromSeconds(serverSettings.AutoBanTime));
3292 }
3293
3294 //GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.LastUpdateID++;
3295
3296 SendVoteStatus(connectedClients);
3297
3298 int endVoteCount = ConnectedClients.Count(c => c.HasSpawned && c.GetVote<bool>(VoteType.EndRound));
3299 int endVoteMax = GameMain.Server.ConnectedClients.Count(c => c.HasSpawned);
3300 if (serverSettings.AllowEndVoting && endVoteMax > 0 &&
3301 ((float)endVoteCount / (float)endVoteMax) >= serverSettings.EndVoteRequiredRatio)
3302 {
3303 Log("Ending round by votes (" + endVoteCount + "/" + (endVoteMax - endVoteCount) + ")", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
3304 EndGame(wasSaved: false);
3305 }
3306 }

3311

3315 Voting.ServerWrite(msg);

3317
3318 foreach (var c in recipients)
3319 {
3320 serverPeer.Send(msg, c.Connection, DeliveryMethod.Reliable);
3321 }

3324 public void SwitchSubmarine()
3325 {
3326 if (!(Voting.ActiveVote is Voting.SubmarineVote subVote)) { return; }
3327
3328 SubmarineInfo targetSubmarine = subVote.Sub;
3329 VoteType voteType = Voting.ActiveVote.VoteType;
3330 Client starter = Voting.ActiveVote.VoteStarter;
3331 int deliveryFee = 0;
3332
3333 switch (voteType)
3334 {
3335 case VoteType.PurchaseAndSwitchSub:
3336 case VoteType.PurchaseSub:
3337 // Pay for submarine
3338 GameMain.GameSession.PurchaseSubmarine(targetSubmarine, starter);
3339 break;
3340 case VoteType.SwitchSub:
3341 deliveryFee = subVote.DeliveryFee;
3342 break;
3343 default:
3344 return;
3345 }
3346
3347 if (voteType != VoteType.PurchaseSub)
3348 {
3349 GameMain.GameSession.SwitchSubmarine(targetSubmarine, deliveryFee, starter);
3350 }
3351
3352 Voting.StopSubmarineVote(true);
3353 }

3389 private IEnumerable<CoroutineStatus> SendClientPermissionsAfterClientListSynced(Client recipient, Client client)
3390 {
3391 DateTime timeOut = DateTime.Now + new TimeSpan(0, 0, 10);
3392 while (recipient.LastRecvClientListUpdate < LastClientListUpdateID)
3393 {
3394 if (DateTime.Now > timeOut || GameMain.Server == null || !connectedClients.Contains(recipient))
3395 {
3396 yield return CoroutineStatus.Success;
3397 }
3398 yield return null;
3399 }
3400
3401 SendClientPermissions(recipient, client);
3402 yield return CoroutineStatus.Success;
3403 }

3490 public void SetClientCharacter(Client client, Character newCharacter)
3491 {
3492 if (client == null) return;
3493
3494 //the client's previous character is no longer a remote player
3495 if (client.Character != null)
3496 {
3497 client.Character.IsRemotePlayer = false;
3498 client.Character.OwnerClientEndPoint = null;
3499 client.Character.OwnerClientName = null;
3500 }
3501
3502 if (newCharacter == null)
3503 {
3504 if (client.Character != null) //removing control of the current character
3505 {
3506 CreateEntityEvent(client.Character, new Character.ControlEventData(null));
3507 client.Character = null;
3508 }
3509 }
3510 else //taking control of a new character
3511 {
3512 newCharacter.ClientDisconnected = false;
3513 newCharacter.KillDisconnectedTimer = 0.0f;
3514 newCharacter.ResetNetState();
3515 if (client.Character != null)
3516 {
3517 newCharacter.LastNetworkUpdateID = client.Character.LastNetworkUpdateID;
3518 }
3519
3520 if (newCharacter.Info != null && newCharacter.Info.Character == null)
3521 {
3522 newCharacter.Info.Character = newCharacter;
3523 }
3524
3525 newCharacter.OwnerClientEndPoint = client.Connection.EndPointString;
3526 newCharacter.OwnerClientName = client.Name;
3527 newCharacter.IsRemotePlayer = true;
3528 newCharacter.Enabled = true;
3529 client.Character = newCharacter;
3530 CreateEntityEvent(newCharacter, new Character.ControlEventData(client));
3531 }

3534 private void UpdateCharacterInfo(IReadMessage message, Client sender)
3535 {
3536 sender.SpectateOnly = message.ReadBoolean() && (serverSettings.AllowSpectating || sender.Connection == OwnerConnection);
3537 if (sender.SpectateOnly)
3538 {
3539 return;
3540 }
3541
3542 int tagCount = message.ReadByte();
3543 HashSet<Identifier> tagSet = new HashSet<Identifier>();
3544 for (int i = 0; i < tagCount; i++)
3545 {
3546 tagSet.Add(message.ReadIdentifier());
3547 }
3548 int hairIndex = message.ReadByte();
3549 int beardIndex = message.ReadByte();
3550 int moustacheIndex = message.ReadByte();
3551 int faceAttachmentIndex = message.ReadByte();
3552 Color skinColor = message.ReadColorR8G8B8();
3553 Color hairColor = message.ReadColorR8G8B8();
3554 Color facialHairColor = message.ReadColorR8G8B8();
3555
3556 List<JobVariant> jobPreferences = new List<JobVariant>();
3557 int count = message.ReadByte();
3558 // TODO: modding support?
3559 for (int i = 0; i < Math.Min(count, 3); i++)
3560 {
3561 string jobIdentifier = message.ReadString();
3562 int variant = message.ReadByte();
3563 if (JobPrefab.Prefabs.ContainsKey(jobIdentifier))
3564 {
3565 jobPreferences.Add(new JobVariant(JobPrefab.Prefabs[jobIdentifier], variant));
3566 }
3567 }
3568
3569 sender.CharacterInfo = new CharacterInfo(CharacterPrefab.HumanSpeciesName, sender.Name);
3570 sender.CharacterInfo.RecreateHead(tagSet.ToImmutableHashSet(), hairIndex, beardIndex, moustacheIndex, faceAttachmentIndex);
3571 sender.CharacterInfo.Head.SkinColor = skinColor;
3572 sender.CharacterInfo.Head.HairColor = hairColor;
3573 sender.CharacterInfo.Head.FacialHairColor = facialHairColor;
3574
3575 if (jobPreferences.Count > 0)
3576 {
3577 sender.JobPreferences = jobPreferences;
3578 }
3579 }

3581 public void AssignJobs(List<Client> unassigned)
3582 {
3583 var jobList = JobPrefab.Prefabs.ToList();
3584 unassigned = new List<Client>(unassigned);
3585 unassigned = unassigned.OrderBy(sp => Rand.Int(int.MaxValue)).ToList();
3586
3587 Dictionary<JobPrefab, int> assignedClientCount = new Dictionary<JobPrefab, int>();
3588 foreach (JobPrefab jp in jobList)
3589 {
3590 assignedClientCount.Add(jp, 0);
3591 }
3592
3593 CharacterTeamType teamID = CharacterTeamType.None;
3594 if (unassigned.Count > 0) { teamID = unassigned[0].TeamID; }
3595
3596 //if we're playing a multiplayer campaign, check which clients already have a character and a job
3597 //(characters are persistent in campaigns)
3598 if (GameMain.GameSession.GameMode is MultiPlayerCampaign multiplayerCampaign)
3599 {
3600 var campaignAssigned = multiplayerCampaign.GetAssignedJobs(connectedClients);
3601 //remove already assigned clients from unassigned
3602 unassigned.RemoveAll(u => campaignAssigned.ContainsKey(u));
3603 //add up to assigned client count
3604 foreach (KeyValuePair<Client, Job> clientJob in campaignAssigned)
3605 {
3606 assignedClientCount[clientJob.Value.Prefab]++;
3607 clientJob.Key.AssignedJob = new JobVariant(clientJob.Value.Prefab, clientJob.Value.Variant);
3608 }
3609 }
3610
3611 //count the clients who already have characters with an assigned job
3612 foreach (Client c in connectedClients)
3613 {
3614 if (c.TeamID != teamID || unassigned.Contains(c)) { continue; }
3615 if (c.Character?.Info?.Job != null && !c.Character.IsDead)
3616 {
3617 assignedClientCount[c.Character.Info.Job.Prefab]++;
3618 }
3619 }
3620
3621 //if any of the players has chosen a job that is Always Allowed, give them that job
3622 for (int i = unassigned.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
3623 {
3624 if (unassigned[i].JobPreferences.Count == 0) { continue; }
3625 if (!unassigned[i].JobPreferences.Any() || !unassigned[i].JobPreferences[0].Prefab.AllowAlways) { continue; }
3626 unassigned[i].AssignedJob = unassigned[i].JobPreferences[0];
3627 unassigned.RemoveAt(i);
3628 }
3629
3630 // Assign the necessary jobs that are always required at least one, in vanilla this means in practice the captain
3631 bool unassignedJobsFound = true;
3632 while (unassignedJobsFound && unassigned.Any())
3633 {
3634 unassignedJobsFound = false;
3635
3636 foreach (JobPrefab jobPrefab in jobList)
3637 {
3638 if (unassigned.Count == 0) { break; }
3639 if (jobPrefab.MinNumber < 1 || assignedClientCount[jobPrefab] >= jobPrefab.MinNumber) { continue; }
3640 // Find the client that wants the job the most, don't force any jobs yet, because it might be that we can meet the preference for other jobs.
3641 Client client = FindClientWithJobPreference(unassigned, jobPrefab, forceAssign: false);
3642 if (client != null)
3643 {
3644 AssignJob(client, jobPrefab);
3645 }
3646 }
3647
3648 if (unassigned.Any())
3649 {
3650 // Another pass, force required jobs that are not yet filled.
3651 foreach (JobPrefab jobPrefab in jobList)
3652 {
3653 if (unassigned.Count == 0) { break; }
3654 if (jobPrefab.MinNumber < 1 || assignedClientCount[jobPrefab] >= jobPrefab.MinNumber) { continue; }
3655 AssignJob(FindClientWithJobPreference(unassigned, jobPrefab, forceAssign: true), jobPrefab);
3656 }
3657 }
3658
3659 void AssignJob(Client client, JobPrefab jobPrefab)
3660 {
3661 client.AssignedJob =
3662 client.JobPreferences.FirstOrDefault(jp => jp.Prefab == jobPrefab) ??
3663 new JobVariant(jobPrefab, Rand.Int(jobPrefab.Variants));
3664
3665 assignedClientCount[jobPrefab]++;
3666 unassigned.Remove(client);
3667
3668 //the job still needs more crew members, set unassignedJobsFound to true to keep the while loop running
3669 if (assignedClientCount[jobPrefab] < jobPrefab.MinNumber) { unassignedJobsFound = true; }
3670 }
3671 }
3672
3673 List<WayPoint> availableSpawnPoints = WayPoint.WayPointList.FindAll(wp =>
3674 wp.SpawnType == SpawnType.Human &&
3675 wp.Submarine != null && wp.Submarine.TeamID == teamID);
3676
3677 /*bool canAssign = false;
3678 do
3679 {
3680 canAssign = false;
3681 foreach (WayPoint spawnPoint in unassignedSpawnPoints)
3682 {
3683 if (unassigned.Count == 0) { break; }
3684
3685 JobPrefab job = spawnPoint.AssignedJob ?? JobPrefab.List.Values.GetRandom();
3686 if (assignedClientCount[job] >= job.MaxNumber) { continue; }
3687
3688 Client assignedClient = FindClientWithJobPreference(unassigned, job, true);
3689 if (assignedClient != null)
3690 {
3691 assignedClient.AssignedJob = job;
3692 assignedClientCount[job]++;
3693 unassigned.Remove(assignedClient);
3694 canAssign = true;
3695 }
3696 }
3697 } while (unassigned.Count > 0 && canAssign);*/
3698
3699 // Attempt to give the clients a job they have in their job preferences.
3700 // First evaluate all the primary preferences, then all the secondary etc.
3701 for (int preferenceIndex = 0; preferenceIndex < 3; preferenceIndex++)
3702 {
3703 for (int i = unassigned.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
3704 {
3705 Client client = unassigned[i];
3706 if (preferenceIndex >= client.JobPreferences.Count) { continue; }
3707 var preferredJob = client.JobPreferences[preferenceIndex];
3708 JobPrefab jobPrefab = preferredJob.Prefab;
3709 if (assignedClientCount[jobPrefab] >= jobPrefab.MaxNumber || client.Karma < jobPrefab.MinKarma)
3710 {
3711 //can't assign this job if maximum number has reached or the clien't karma is too low
3712 continue;
3713 }
3714
3715 client.AssignedJob = preferredJob;
3716 assignedClientCount[jobPrefab]++;
3717 unassigned.RemoveAt(i);
3718 }
3719 }
3720
3721 //give random jobs to rest of the clients
3722 foreach (Client c in unassigned)
3723 {
3724 //find all jobs that are still available
3725 var remainingJobs = jobList.FindAll(jp => assignedClientCount[jp] < jp.MaxNumber && c.Karma >= jp.MinKarma);
3726
3727 //all jobs taken, give a random job
3728 if (remainingJobs.Count == 0)
3729 {
3730 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Failed to assign a suitable job for \"" + c.Name + "\" (all jobs already have the maximum numbers of players). Assigning a random job...");
3731 int jobIndex = Rand.Range(0, jobList.Count);
3732 int skips = 0;
3733 while (c.Karma < jobList[jobIndex].MinKarma)
3734 {
3735 jobIndex++;
3736 skips++;
3737 if (jobIndex >= jobList.Count) { jobIndex -= jobList.Count; }
3738 if (skips >= jobList.Count) { break; }
3739 }
3740 c.AssignedJob =
3741 c.JobPreferences.FirstOrDefault(jp => jp.Prefab == jobList[jobIndex]) ??
3742 new JobVariant(jobList[jobIndex], 0);
3743 assignedClientCount[c.AssignedJob.Prefab]++;
3744 }
3745 //if one of the client's preferences is still available, give them that job
3746 else if (c.JobPreferences.Any(jp => remainingJobs.Contains(jp.Prefab)))
3747 {
3748 foreach (JobVariant preferredJob in c.JobPreferences)
3749 {
3750 c.AssignedJob = preferredJob;
3751 assignedClientCount[preferredJob.Prefab]++;
3752 break;
3753 }
3754 }
3755 else //none of the client's preferred jobs available, choose a random job
3756 {
3757 c.AssignedJob = new JobVariant(remainingJobs[Rand.Range(0, remainingJobs.Count)], 0);
3758 assignedClientCount[c.AssignedJob.Prefab]++;
3759 }
3760 }
3761 }
3762
3763 public void AssignBotJobs(List<CharacterInfo> bots, CharacterTeamType teamID)
3764 {
3765 Dictionary<JobPrefab, int> assignedPlayerCount = new Dictionary<JobPrefab, int>();
3766 foreach (JobPrefab jp in JobPrefab.Prefabs)
3767 {
3768 assignedPlayerCount.Add(jp, 0);
3769 }
3770
3771 //count the clients who already have characters with an assigned job
3772 foreach (Client c in connectedClients)
3773 {
3774 if (c.TeamID != teamID) continue;
3775 if (c.Character?.Info?.Job != null && !c.Character.IsDead)
3776 {
3777 assignedPlayerCount[c.Character.Info.Job.Prefab]++;
3778 }
3779 else if (c.CharacterInfo?.Job != null)
3780 {
3781 assignedPlayerCount[c.CharacterInfo?.Job.Prefab]++;
3782 }
3783 }
3784
3785 List<CharacterInfo> unassignedBots = new List<CharacterInfo>(bots);
3786
3787 List<WayPoint> spawnPoints = WayPoint.WayPointList.FindAll(wp =>
3788 wp.SpawnType == SpawnType.Human &&
3789 wp.Submarine != null && wp.Submarine.TeamID == teamID)
3790 .OrderBy(sp => Rand.Int(int.MaxValue))
3791 .OrderBy(sp => sp.AssignedJob == null ? 0 : 1)
3792 .ToList();
3793
3794 bool canAssign = false;
3795 do
3796 {
3797 canAssign = false;
3798 foreach (WayPoint spawnPoint in spawnPoints)
3799 {
3800 if (unassignedBots.Count == 0) { break; }
3801
3802 JobPrefab jobPrefab = spawnPoint.AssignedJob ?? JobPrefab.Prefabs.GetRandomUnsynced();
3803 if (assignedPlayerCount[jobPrefab] >= jobPrefab.MaxNumber) { continue; }
3804
3805 var variant = Rand.Range(0, jobPrefab.Variants, Rand.RandSync.ServerAndClient);
3806 unassignedBots[0].Job = new Job(jobPrefab, Rand.RandSync.ServerAndClient, variant);
3807 assignedPlayerCount[jobPrefab]++;
3808 unassignedBots.Remove(unassignedBots[0]);
3809 canAssign = true;
3810 }
3811 } while (unassignedBots.Count > 0 && canAssign);
3812
3813 //find a suitable job for the rest of the bots
3814 foreach (CharacterInfo c in unassignedBots)
3815 {
3816 //find all jobs that are still available
3817 var remainingJobs = JobPrefab.Prefabs.Where(jp => assignedPlayerCount[jp] < jp.MaxNumber);
3818 //all jobs taken, give a random job
3819 if (remainingJobs.None())
3820 {
3821 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Failed to assign a suitable job for bot \"" + c.Name + "\" (all jobs already have the maximum numbers of players). Assigning a random job...");
3822 #warning TODO: is this randsync correct?
3823 c.Job = Job.Random(Rand.RandSync.ServerAndClient);
3824 assignedPlayerCount[c.Job.Prefab]++;
3825 }
3826 else //some jobs still left, choose one of them by random
3827 {
3828 var job = remainingJobs.GetRandomUnsynced();
3829 var variant = Rand.Range(0, job.Variants);
3830 c.Job = new Job(job, Rand.RandSync.Unsynced, variant);
3831 assignedPlayerCount[c.Job.Prefab]++;
3832 }
3833 }
3834 }
3835
3836 private Client FindClientWithJobPreference(List<Client> clients, JobPrefab job, bool forceAssign = false)
3837 {
3838 int bestPreference = int.MaxValue;
3839 Client preferredClient = null;
3840 foreach (Client c in clients)
3841 {
3842 if (ServerSettings.KarmaEnabled && c.Karma < job.MinKarma) { continue; }
3843 int index = c.JobPreferences.IndexOf(c.JobPreferences.Find(j => j.Prefab == job));
3844 if (index > -1 && index < bestPreference)
3845 {
3846 bestPreference = index;
3847 preferredClient = c;
3848 }
3849 }
3850
3851 //none of the clients wants the job, assign it to random client
3852 if (forceAssign && preferredClient == null)
3853 {
3854 preferredClient = clients[Rand.Int(clients.Count)];
3855 }
3856
3857 return preferredClient;
3858 }

3908 public override void Disconnect()
3909 {
3910 if (started)
3911 {
3912 started = false;
3913
3914 serverSettings.BanList.Save();
3915
3916 if (GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedSub != null) { serverSettings.SelectedSubmarine = GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedSub.Name; }
3917 if (GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedShuttle != null) { serverSettings.SelectedShuttle = GameMain.NetLobbyScreen.SelectedShuttle.Name; }
3918
3919 serverSettings.SaveSettings();
3920
3921 ModSender.Dispose();
3922
3923 if (serverSettings.SaveServerLogs)
3924 {
3925 Log("Shutting down the server...", ServerLog.MessageType.ServerMessage);
3926 serverSettings.ServerLog.Save();
3927 }
3928
3929 GameAnalyticsManager.AddDesignEvent("GameServer:ShutDown");
3930 serverPeer?.Close(DisconnectReason.ServerShutdown.ToString());
3931
3932 SteamManager.CloseServer();
3933 }
3934 }
